# Accelerating Growth Through Innovation & Collaboration

Mengakselerasi Pertumbuhan Melalui Inovasi & Kolaborasi

![](images/f808ec11e75f5b144b7b43617a9abb621740ac13fa77e46e6db1d7c3ccab7864.jpg)

Perseroan optimistis bahwa percepatan pertumbuhan bisnis akan tercapai melalui inovasi dan kolaborasi yang diterapkan secara konsisten.

The Company is optimistic that accelerated business growth will be achieved through innovation and collaboration that is implemented consistently.

Di tahun 2023 Perseroan berHASIL memanfaatkan momentum pertumbuhan positif industri properti dengan mencatatkan rekor tertinggi sepanjang-Sejarah atas pre-sales sebesar Rp10,2 triliun. Pencapaian luar biasa ini terwujud antara lain karena inovasi pengembangan konsep Produk yang terus menerus dilakukan Seeingga Perseroan selelu menghasilkanproduk-produk properti bermutu tinggi dan berhasil diserapasar. Inovasi juga dilakukan di semua segmen usaha dalam rangka selelu menciptakan pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan.

Perseroan juga berhasil menumbuhan semangat kolaborasi, baik diantara individu, departemen unit bisnis maupun mitra usaha. Kolaborasi ini juga yang menjadi pendorong sinergi dalam pensiptaan inovasi. Perseroan optimistis bahwa melalui inovasi dan kolaborasi yang diterapkan secara konsisten, Perseroan akan meraih percepatan pertumbuhan bisnis.

In 2023, the Company managed to capitalize on the positive growth momentum of the property industry by recording an all-time high presales of Rp10.2 trillion. This remarkable achievement was due to continuous innovation in product concept development so that the Company always produces high-quality property products and successfully absorbed by the market. Innovations are also implemented in all business segments to always create sustainable growth.

The Company has also fostered a spirit of collaboration between individuals, business unit departments, and business partners. This collaboration also drives synergy in the creation of innovation. The Company is optimistic that through a consistent implementation of innovation and collaboration, the Company will achieve accelerated business growth.

# Milestones

![](images/4b9262df284ba6aad65b4cc998647a75923ac24b1ccc017a81e0d5ebfadad23c.jpg)

1981 - 1990

1981

# Pendirian Perusahaan

Company Establishment

Dr. (HC) Ir. Ciputra

mendirikan Perseroan dengan name PT Citra Habitat Indonesia.

established the Company under the name of PT Citra Habitat Indonesia.

1984

# Proyek Perumahan Pertama

First Residential Project

Pengembangan proyek perumahan pertama, yang merupakan cikal bakal proyek berskala kota, CitraGarden City Jakarta.

Developed its first residential project, which was the origin of a township development project,

CitraGarden City Jakarta.

1990

# Penggantian Nama Perusahaan

Change of Company Name

PT Citra Habitat Indonesia berganti namamenjadi PT Ciputra Development.

PT Citra Habitat Indonesia changed its name to PT Ciputra Development.

![](images/f6c536fb5d75b86e897953342a8ddacaea11a6ea29e0c8c75b3fe1268e5b54a6.jpg)

667-667

1993

# Proyek Perumahan Terbesar di Surabaya

Largest Residential Project in Surabaya

Pengembangan proyek berskala kota di Surabaya, CitraLand Surabaya.

Development of township project in Surabaya, Citraland Surabaya.

# Proyek Komersial Pertama  
First Commercial Project

Mal dan Hotel Ciputra Jakarta resmi beroperasi sebagai projyek komersial pertama Perseroan.

Ciputra Mall and Ciputra Hotel Jakarta was officially operating as the Company's first commercial project.

1994

# Penawaran Umum Perdana Initial Public Offering

Perseroan seksukan Penawaran Umum Perdana sahmed (IPO) dan tercatat di Bursa Efek Jakarta.

The Company conducted Initial Public Offering (IPO) and was listed on Jakarta Stock Exchange.

# Proyek Berskala Kota Terbesar Largest Township Development

CitraRaya Tangerang resmi diluncurkan sebagai perumahan berskala kota terbesar, dengan luas pengembangan mencapal 2.700 hektare.

CitraRaya Tangerang was officially launched as the largest residential township with total development area of 2,700 hectares. The Company's first commercial project.

![](images/3f516781156fcacfad762b21f26c791ed25c8484d28b865b9910e3ab1134ec84.jpg)

![](images/24a2febae7e5fc188aedf12572345d14fd69c5512e7682c1bb804f14974a67f4.jpg)

# 2004

# Ekspansi ke Kalimantan Expansion to Kalimantan

Pengembangan bisnis Perseroan ke Iuar Pulau Jawa melalui proyek CitraLand Banjarmasin di Kalimantan.

Business expansion of the Company to outside Java Island through CitraLand Banjarmasin project in Kalimantan.

# 2011

# Proyek Kesehatan Pertama First Healthcare Project

Perseroan masuk ke bisnis healthcare  
dengan mengoperasikan proyek  
pertamanya, Ciputra Hospital CitraRaya  
Tangerang.

The Company engaged in healthcare business by operating its first project, Ciputra Hospital CitraRaya Tangerang.

# 2009

# Ekspansi ke Sulawesi Expansion to Sulawesi

Perseroan melanjutkan ekspansi bisnis ke Sulawesi malalui pengembangan proyek CitraLand Celebes Makassar.

The Company continued its business expansion to Sulawesi by developing CitraLand Celebes Makassar project.

# 2015

# Proyek Reklamasi Pertama First Reclamation Project

Perseroan seksukanan terobosan dalam teknik pengembangan reklamasi, dengan proyek pertamanya, CitraLand City Losari Makassar.

The Company made a breakthrough in reclamation development technique with its first project, CitraLand City Losari Makassar.

# 2017

# Penggabungan Usaha Business Merger

Perseroan makukanan penggabungan usaha dengan anak-anak perusahaan, PT Ciputra Surya Tbk dan PT Ciputra Property Tbk.

The Company merged with subsidiaries, PT Ciputra Surya Tbk and PT Ciputra Property Tbk.

# Aksi Korporasi dan Sanksi Perdagangan Saham Tahun 2023

Corporate Action and Stock Trading Sanction in 2023

Pada 27 Maret 2023, Perseroan seksukan penurunan modal dengan menarik kembali 24,608,142 saham dari transaksi penggabungan usaha dengan hari Rp250 per saham. Setelah penurunan modal ini, jumlah saham yang beredar Perseroan menjadi 18,535,695,255 saham, turun dari sebelumnya 18,560,303,397 saham. Perseroan mendapatkan persetujuan dari Bursa Efek Indonesia (BEI) melalui pengumuman No. Peng-P-00759/BEI. PP2/04-2023 yang berlaku mulai 5 April 2023.

Selama tahun 2023, Perseroan tidak dikenakan sanksi perdagangan saham oleh BEI, termasuk penghentian sementara kepada pencabutan hak perdagangan saham.

On March 27, 2023, the Company conducted capital reduction through withdrawal of treasury stock resulting from the Company's merger transaction totaling 24,608,142 shares at a nominal price of Rp250 (full amount). With this reduction, the number of the Company's outstanding shares became 18,535,695,255 shares, a decrease from the previous total of 18,560,303,397 shares. The capital reduction had been approved by Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) through its announcement No. Peng-P-00759/BEI. PP2/04-2023 and became effective on April 5, 2023.

Regarding share trading sanctions, throughout 2023 it can be reported that the Company did not receive any sanction from the IDX, either in the form of periodic suspension or revocation of trading rights.

Dewan Komisaris tersebut mengimbauagar Direksi terus mendedepankan nilai-nilai IPE,menerapkan manajemen risiko dan mematuhi peraturan yang berlaku dalam menceksekusi strategi dengan cermat demi menciptakan pertumbuhan dan meraih pencapaian optimal di tahun 2024.

# Para Pemegang Saham Yang Terhormat,

Puji syukur kami panjatkan kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa atasBERkembang dan meraih pencapaian optimal di tahun 2023 yang PENH dengan optimisme di tengah berakhirnya pandemi COVID-19.

Indonesia pada tahun 2023 mengalami pertumbuhan ekonomi yang positif setelah Pemerintah menetapkan berakhirnya status pandemi COVID-19 di Indonesia pada bulan Juni 2023. PadatriwulanIVekonomiIndonesiatercatat tumbuh  $5,04\%$  (yoy) dan secara full year pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia tercatat sebesar  $5,05\%$  (yoy).

# Valued Shareholders,

We are grateful to God Almighty for His grace and blessings, which allow the Company to grow and accomplish its goals in 2023—a year full of hope as the COVID-19 pandemic draws close.

Indonesia in 2023 experienced positive economic growth after the Government declared the end of the COVID-19 pandemic status in Indonesia in June 2023. Dewan Komisaris menilai bahwa Direksi telah makukan terobosan inovasi dalam mendukung ekspansi bisnis Perseroan di seluruh Indonesia dengan tetap Berkomitmen pada nilai-nilai Integritas, Profesionalisme dan Entrepreneurship (IPE) serta;penerapan manajemen risiko. Saat ini pengelolaan Perseroan juga sudah mulai melibatkan Generasi Ketiga Ciputra sebagai pereus yang melanjutkan praktik bisnis yang sudah dimulai dan diterapkan oleh pendiri perusahaan, Alm. Bapak Ciputra.

# PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS

After the COVID-19 pandemic, the Board of Commissioners has observed that the Board of Directors has implemented a more upbeat business achievement strategy to capitalize on the recovery momentum. The Board of Commissioners considers that the Board of Directors has made innovative breakthroughs in supporting the Company's business expansion throughout Indonesia while remaining committed to the values of Integrity, Professionalism, and Entrepreneurship (IPE) and the implementation of risk management. Currently, the Company's management has also begun to involve the third generation of Ciputra as a successor who continues the business practices that were started and implemented by the founder of the company, the late Mr. Ciputra.

The Company achieved record-high pre-sales during the year by developing and launching new green, modern, and integrated city-scale projects. From a financial perspective, the Company also recorded an increase in revenue and financial position on the balance sheet. For this reason, the Board of Commissioners appreciates and evaluates that the Board of Directors has shown its best performance.

The Board of Commissioners welcomes the Company's readiness to be involved in the national strategic project of the Ibu Kota Nusantara (IKN). The Company plans to build a residence for the State Civil Apparatus (ASN) where currently the Company has submitted a proposal to the IKN Authority for a Public Private Partnership (PPP) scheme and is still awaiting the results of the feasibility study, for which the Company has obtained a letter to proceed. In addition, the Company will also develop an integrated area in IKN, which will consist of housing, hotels, golf courses, Meetings, Incentives, Conference and Exhibition (MICE) facilities, and a botanical garden. The Board of Commissioners hopes this contribution can strengthen national development and positively impact national economic growth and the surrounding community.

Complementing the Company's positive achievements in operational and financial terms, the Board of Commissioners is also proud of the various awards the Company has achieved. The Board of Commissioners also appreciates Mr. Candra Ciputra, who won the "The Best Industry Marketing Champion 2023 - Property Sector" award at the 2023 Indonesian Marketeer of the Year event. We hope this award can make Mr. Candra a role model for a figure who consistently implements an innovative and entrepreneurial culture, thus successfully making the Company a property company that can provide added value on an ongoing basis. Apart from that, the Board of Commissioners is also happy with the inauguration of Mr. Budiarsa Sastrawinata as FIABCI World President for the 2023-2024 term. We hope that, under Mr. Budiarsa's leadership, FIABCI will continue

# PEMANTAUAN TERHADAP PERUMUSAN DAN IMPLEMENTASI STRATEGI

Dewan Komisaris senantiasa memantau perumusan maupun implementasi terkait kebikan langkah strategis Perseroan. Di tahun 2023 ini, kami telah memberikan masukan dan arah di dalam rapat yang diadakan sebanyak 7 (tujuh) kali bersama Direksi. Kami memahami dalam momentum pemulihan ini, Direksi memprioritaskan strategi ekspansi yang optimal melalui diversifikasi dan segmentasi proyek yang luas guna memaksimalkan pertumbuhan. Oleh karenanya, kami mendorong Direksi untuk dapat mengimplementasikan strategi tersebut dengan tetap berpegang pada nilai-nilai IPE yang ditanamkan oleh Alm. Bapak Ciputra dan menerapkan manajemen risiko.

Menurut pemantauan kami, keseluruhan kebikan strategis tersebut telah ditindaklanjuti dan diimplementasikan secara efektif dan optimal seksuai saran dan arahan kami dengan tetap mematuhi peraturan perundang-undangan dan koridor hukum yang berlaku. Kami mengapresiasi upaya Direksi dalam menerapkan kebikan strategis Perseroan seksuai rencana dan selanjutnya berharap agar kerja sama yang baik antara Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dapat terus ditingkatkan dalam rangka pencapaian tujuan perusahaan yang berkelanjutan.

# PANDANGAN ATAS PENERAPAN PRINSIP GOVERNANSI KORPORAT

Dewan Komisaris memberikan presupasi terhadap sikap adaptif dan responsif Perseroan dalam menerapkan best practices dalam tata kelola perusahaan, khususnya, dengan mengadopsi Pedoman Umum Governansi Corporat Indonesia (PUGKI) 2021 yang dikeluarkan oleh Komite Nasional Kebijakan Governansi. Kami berharap pengerapan praktik-praktik termutakhir di tengah perubahan dinamika bisnis dapat menc Gatkan daya saing Perseroan di industri propertiserta terus memberikan kontribusi positif terhadap pelestarian lingkungan dan kesejahteraan sosial.

Sebagai organ pengawas, Dewan Komisaris di tahun 2023 telah melaksanan tugas dalam koridor yang telah ditentukan, di antaranya bersama Direksi menetapkan tolok utur keberHASILAN PerseroaI dalam mencapai target kinerja. Evaluasi atas pemapaian kinerja Perseroan utamanya akan memberikan panduan yang jelas dalam penentuan target kinerja ke depannya dan menilai pemapaian Perseroan dan pada akhirnya mendorong pemapaian yang lebih baik diASA mendatang. Terkait fungsi Komite Audit sebagai organ pendukung, Dewan Komisaris menilai oleh Komite Audit telah bertindak secara independen dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya.

to be a leading real estate community at the global level, inclusive, dynamic, and beneficial to various parties.

# SUPERVISION OF STRATEGY FORMULATION AND IMPLEMENTATION

The Board of Commissioners oversees the development and execution of the Company's strategic policy initiatives at all times. We have directed and contributed to meetings with the Board of Directors 7 (seven) times in 2023. We understand that during this recovery momentum, the Board of Directors prioritizes an optimal expansion strategy through diversification and broad project segmentation to maximize growth. Therefore, we encourage the Board of Directors to implement the strategy while adhering to the IPE values instilled by the late Mr. Ciputra and implementing risk management.

Our oversight shows that all strategic policies have been followed up on and performed as best they can be, in compliance with our recommendations and guidance and all relevant legal corridors and laws. We value the Board of Directors' efforts in carrying out the Company's strategic policies as planned, and we also hope that the Board of Commissioners and Directors' productive working relationship can be strengthened in the future to help the Company reach its long-term objectives.

# OPINIONS ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF CORPORATE GOVERNANCE PRINCIPLES

The Board of Commissioners appreciates the Company's adaptable and responsive approach to implementing best practices in corporate governance, especially through adopting the National Committee for Governance Policy's 2021 General Guidelines for Indonesian Corporate Governance (PUGKI). We wish that the implementation of the latest practices amidst the changing business dynamics can increase the Company's competitiveness in the property industry and continue to make a positive contribution to environmental preservation and social welfare.

As a supervisory organ, the Board of Commissioners in 2023 has performed its duties within a predetermined corridor, including the Board of Directors setting benchmarks for the Company's success in achieving performance targets. Evaluation of the Company's performance achievements will provide clear guidance in determining future performance targets and assessing the Company's accomplishments, ultimately encouraging better achievements in the future. Regarding the function of the Audit Committee as a supporting organ, the Board of Commissioners considers that the Audit Committee has acted independently in carrying out their duties and responsibilities.

Perseroan juga telah melaksanan keputusan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan dalam hal pembagian dividen tunai atas pencapaian kinerja tahun 2022, yang telah dibayarkan pada tanggal 25 Juli 2023.

Ke depannya Dewan Komisaris bersama Perseroan akan terus melakukan penyempurnaan dan peningkatan kualitas governansi korporat yang terdiri atas empat pilar: perilaku beretika, akuntabilitas, transparansi dan keberlanjutan. # COMPANY'S STRATEGIC PLAN AND POLICY

Capitalizing on the positive growth momentum of the property industry in 2023, the Company formulated a strategic plan to increase its pre-sales target for 2023 to Rp9.8 trillion, up  $19\%$  from pre-sales in 2022 which was recorded at Rp8.2 trillion. This continues the Company's strategic expansion, which leverages geographical diversification and will primarily focus on developing and selling landed residential with price options for all income groups, predominantly end-users, both first-home buyers and upgraders. Growth is also expected to be generated from all parts of Indonesia, including Medan and Makassar, with significant contributions from greater Jakarta and greater Surabaya. This aims to create sustainable growth.

The Company is also committed to maintain an optimal land bank to preserve its sustainability. This is a challenge due to the limited and irreplaceable availability of land. For this reason, the Company is replenishing the land developed in existing projects and looking for new strategic locations by expanding to major cities in Indonesia. In addition, the Company continues to develop new projects through joint operation schemes.

The Company continues to maintain prudent capital management by optimizing its debt structure, ensuring adequate liquidity and cash reserves, and selective land banking.

Concerning the Company's growth strategy to increase the contribution of recurring income so that the Company's revenue is more balanced between property development for sale and recurring income, the Company for 2023 formulates the following strategy:

# Pusat Niaga

Selama tahun 2023 operasional tersebut iniagara sudah mengalami perbaikan dengan menc Gatnya untuk pengunjungpusat niaga (foot traffic) maupun tarif sewa. Namun Perseroan tidakiala oleh pengembangan pusat niaga harus dilakukan secara cermat, mengusat adanya perubahan perilaku dari pengunjung pusat niaga yang lebih mengutamakan pengalaman (dengan tersedianya berbagaifasilitas,seperti playground danelahraga indoor) dibandingkan dengan berbelanja, di samping masih adanya perusahaan yang menerapkan Work From Home (WFH) dalam aktivukan pekerjaan sehingga memempengaruhi untuk pengunjung pusat niaga pada hari kerja. Saat ini Perseroan sedang mengembangkan pusat niaga di CitraLand City Losari Makassar yang ditargetkan sebelumsi seleruhnya pada tahun 2026.

# Hotel

Operasional hotel pasca pandemi COVID-19 Juda mengalami perbaikan dengan mencatnya indicator RevPar yang berasil dari kenaikan tarif kamar dan tingkat okupansi. Namun demikian, Perseroan belum berencana untuk menambah pengembangan hoteli.Lagi.Pengembangan hotel Perseroan kebanyakan tidak dilakukan secara stand alone, melainkan merupakan bagian dari mixed-use development Perseroan untuk tujuan mencatkan value dari proyek mixed-use itu sendiri.

# Rumah sakit

Rumah sakit membrukukan peningkatan pendapatan atas pelayanan kesehatan yang tidak terkait dengan COVID-19. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan menjadi因为她 rumah sakit merupakan opsi terbaik dalam hal pengembangan proyek recurring income untuk menciptakan pertumbuhan bisnis. # PERBANDINGAN ANTARA HASIL PENCAPAIAN DENGAN TARGET

Kami melihat bahwaoculars esekulurihan kinerja Perseroan telah berhasil mencapai target yang ditetapkan di awal tahun. Perseroan mencapai rekor tertinggi sepanjang sejarah dengan mencatat pre-sales sebesar Rp10,2 triliun, tumbuh  $24\%$  dari tahun 2022 yang tercatat Rp8,2 triliun dan mencapai  $105\%$  dari target yang ditetapkan sebesar Rp9,8 triliun. Pencapaian ini terutama didukung oleh kesuksesan launching portfolio proyek Perseroan di lokasi strategis di seluruh Indonesia. Selain itu, insentif PPN DTP yang diberlakukan kembali pada bulan November 2023 juga mendukung pencapaian pre-sales Perseroan dengan kontribusi sebesar Rp769 miliar. Selama tahun 2023 terjadi kenaikan tingkat siku bunga acuan Bank Indonesia (BI rate) sebesar 50 basis poin, namun tingkat sukubunga KPR masih relatif stabil dan KPR tetap kepada metode pembayaran utama dari pelangan dengan kontribusinya sebesar  $63\%$  dari total pre-sales.

# Mall

During 2023, the malls' operations improved with increased revenue, occupancy, foot traffic, and rental rates. However, the Company considers that mall development must be conducted carefully, given the changing behavior of mall visitors who prioritize experience (with the availability of various facilities, such as playgrounds and indoor sports) compared to shopping, while there are still companies that implement Work From Home (WFH) in doing work, thus affecting the number of mall visitors on weekdays. The Company is currently developing a mall in CitraLand City Losari Makassar which is targeted to be fully completed by 2026.

# Hotels

Hotel operations post COVID-19 pandemic have also improved with the increase in RevPar indicators from the increase in room and occupancy rates. However, the Company is not planning to add any more hotel developments. Most of the Company's hotel developments are not stand-alone but are part of the Company's mixed-use development to increase the value of the mixed-use project itself.

# Hospital

Hospitals recorded an increase in revenue from health services unrelated to COVID-19. Therefore, the company considers hospitals to be the best option for developing recurring income projects to grow the business. This is also supported by the issuance of the Health Bill (RUU), which makes it easier for foreign medical and health workers to practice in Indonesia.

# COMPARISON BETWEEN ACHIEVEMENT AND TARGET

The Company's overall performance has successfully achieved the targets set at the beginning of the year. The Company achieved an all-time high of Rp10.2 trillion in pre-sales, a  $24\%$  growth from Rp8.2 trillion in 2022 and  $105\%$  of the target of Rp9.8 trillion. This achievement was mainly supported by successfully launching the Company's project portfolio in strategic locations across Indonesia. In addition, the VAT incentive that was reintroduced in November 2023 also supported the Company's pre-sales achievement with a contribution of Rp769 billion. During 2023 there was a 50 basis points increase in Bank Indonesia's benchmark interest rate (BI rate), however, mortgage interest rates remained relatively stable and mortgages remained the main payment method of customers, contributing  $63\%$  of total pre-sales.

Produk landed residential yang terdiri dari rumah hunian dan kavling tanah telah menjadi kontributor utama pre-sales dengan membrukukan  $80 \%$ dari pre- sale dan pertumbuhan solid  $26 \%$ yoy, diikuti oleh ruko yang mencontribusi  $17 \%$ dengan peningkatan signifikan  $27 \%$ yoy. Unitdengan kisaran*harga Rp2- 5 miliar tumbuh  $21 \%$  dari tahunlalu, terutama berasal dari launching projek Barang di Jakartadan sekitarnya dan klaster Barang di Surabaya dan sekitarnya,di antaranya Pelican Hill, One Arcade dan Attic House.

Launching 3 (tiga) proyek dan lebih dari 15 klasterbaru di sepanjang tahun 2023 berhasil mencatatkan pre-sales seabanyak 3.658 unit atau setara Rp6,4 triliun yang merupakan  $62\%$  dari total pre-sales.

Secara keseluruhan segmen properti komersial sepanjang tahun 2023 juga membrukukan kinerja positif. Seluruh hotel Perseroan melaporkan pertumbuhan metriks Revenue per Available Room (RevPAR), di mana RevPar sebagian tersebut hotel telah melampaui angka sebelum COVID-19. Secara.agregat RevPar hotel tambuh  $13 \%$  dan tercatat pada angka Rp475.000. Landed residential products that consist of residential houses and land plots are still the major contributor to pre-sales by accounting for  $80\%$  of pre-sales and a solid growth of  $26\%$  yoy, followed by shophouses that contributed  $17\%$  with a significant increase of  $27\%$  yoy. Strata offices recorded  $94\%$  yoy growth despite unfavorable conditions in the high-rise property market. Meanwhile, apartments recorded a decline in pre-sales of  $36\%$  yoy as market demand has not yet grown.

Geographically, the greater Jakarta area recorded pre-sales of Rp5.4 trillion, with significant growth of  $203\%$  from last year's Rp1.7 trillion, contributing  $52\%$  of pre-sales and being the main contributor. This figure mainly came from launching new projects CitraGarden Serpong, Citra City Sentul, and CitraGarden Bintaro, which also solidified the Company's position in the greater Jakarta area, and greater Surabaya became the second contributor with a contribution of  $19\%$ , which mainly came from the CitraLand Surabaya project. Sumatra experienced a decline in pre-sales of  $44\%$  yoy. However, the Company anticipates more substantial growth with the planned launch of the CitraLand City Sampali Kota Deli Megapolitan project. Sulawesi reported a negative growth of  $23\%$ , mainly due to limited unit stock in the CitraLand City Losari Makassar project.

Regarding market segmentation, property products with a price per unit of up to Rp2 billion accounted for  $47\%$  of pre-sales, while the contribution from units priced above Rp2 billion amounted to  $53\%$ . Pre-sales from this middle segment had per unit prices ranging from Rp1-3 billion. Units with a price range of Rp1-2 billion, which grew significantly by  $58\%$ , were contributed by the greater Jakarta area, influenced by the launching of new projects concentrated in the greater Jakarta area. Units in the price range of Rp2-5 billion grew  $21\%$  from last year, mainly from launching new projects in Jakarta and surrounding areas and new clusters in Surabaya and surrounding areas, including Pelican Hill, One Arcade, and Attic House.

The launching of 3 (three) projects and more than 15 new clusters throughout 2023 succeeded in recording pre-sales of 3,658 units or equivalent to Rp6.4 trillion which constituted  $62\%$  of the total pre-sales.

Overall, the commercial property segment throughout 2023 also posted positive performance. All of the Company's hotels reported growth in Revenue per Available Room (RevPAR) metrics, with RevPAR for most hotels exceeding pre-COVID-19 figures. In aggregate, hotel RevPar grew by  $13\%$  and stood at Rp475,000. Mall operations also recorded improvements, reflected in revenue (up  $12\%$  yoy), average occupancy  $(89\%)$  as well as foot traffic. Hospitals recorded a  $3\%$  decline in revenue in line with the end of COVID-19. Rental offices recorded a

berakhirnya COVID-19. Kantor sewa mencatat penurunan (4%) dipengaruhi oleh tingkat okupansinya. Golf course dan water park mencatat kenaikan pendapatan sebesar Rp53 miliar. Selama tahun 2023, portfolio segmen properti komersial Perseroan yang terdiri dari 9 (sembilan) hotel, 5 (lima) mal, 3 (tiga) rumah sakit, 3 (tiga) kantor sewa. 1 (satu) lapangan golf dan 6 (enam) water park dengantribusi  $23\%$  dari total pendapatan.

Dari sisi laporan keuangan, Perseroan mencukutan total pendapatan sebesar Rp9,2 triliun, naik  $1 \%$ dari tahun lalu sebesar Rp9,1 triliun. Hal ini berasal dari penurunan penjualan bersih (segmen residenial) sebesar Rp67 miliar, sementara pendapatan usaha (segmen komersial) mencatat pertumbuhan sebesar Rp185 miliar. Secara total pendapatan Perseroan mencapai  $95 \%$ dari targetnya. Laba kotor 2023 relatif stabil pada Rp4,6 triliun dengan marjin laba kotor sebesar  $49,3 \%$ . Laba usaha mencatat penurunan  $4 \%$ menjadi Rp3,0 triliun, demikian juga laba bersih sedikit turun ( $1 \%$ ) menjadi Rp1,8 triliun. Dibandingkan dengan targetnya di awal tahun sekitar Rp1,7 triliun, LABA bersih Perseroan telah tercapai  $11 \%$ di atas targetnya.

Perseroan mengelola arus kas dengan baik dengan membrukutan arus kas operasi yang positif. Pengeluaran untuk belanja modal (capital expenditure) yang naikunjadi Rp1,1 trilium说我debabkan kenaikan arus kas investasi sebesar  $63 \%$  . Arus kas pendanaan sedikit turununjadi Rp1,1 trilium. Secara neto Perseroan membrukutan kenaikan kas bersih Rp1,6 trilium dan melaporkan saldo kas dan setara kas per 31 Desember 2023 sebesar Rp10,6 trilium. Sementara dengan saldo hutang sebesar Rp8,1 trilium, Perseroan mencatat net cash position sebesar Rp2,5 trilium.

Kinerja financiali di atas merupakan bagian dari strategi keberlanjutan Perseroan yang ditetapkan menjadi pentuk aksi nyata Perseroan dalam memberikan kontribusi positif terkait lingkungan dan sosial di industri properti melalui;penerapan praktik tata kelola secara berkelanjutan.Strategi keberlanjutan Perseroan berfokus pada 3 (tiga) pilar utama, yaitu Semangat Unggul dan Inovasi, Membangun Kota Membangun Kehidupan dan Pembangunan yang Bertanggung jawab. Melalui strategi keberlanjutan ini kami memastikan Bahwa setiap aktivitas bisnis kami tidakanyak memberikan nilai bagi masyarakat dan lingkungan di masa sekarang, namun juga bagi generasi mendatang.

Looking at the financial statements, the Company booked total revenue of Rp9.2 trillion, up  $1\%$  from last year's Rp9.1 trillion. The above financial performance is part of the Company's sustainability strategy, which was established as a form of the Company's real action in making a positive contribution related to the environment and society in the property industry through implementing sustainable governance practices. The Company's sustainability strategy focuses on 3 (three) main pillars: the Spirit of Excellence and Innovation, Building Cities, Building Lives, and Responsible Development. Through this sustainability strategy, we ensure that each of our business activities provides value to society and the environment in the present and future generations.

# MENINGKATKAN PENERAPAN GOVERNANSI KORPORAT

Keberadaan governansi korporat menjadi sebelum keharusan dalam rangka penciptaan systemd manajemen yang efisien dan efektif maupun nilai perusahaan yang berkelanjutan. Dalam pengelolaan sumber daya dan usaha, governansi korporat menjadi landasan;penerapan tanggung jawab manajemen. Kami Berkomitmen untuk menjalankan perilakan kepenimpinan dengan tujuan mencapai才有 governansi yang kompetitif, menjalankan bisnis secara etis, memberikan dampak positif pada masyarakat dan lingkungan, mencapatkan kemampuan bertahan dan menciptakan pertumbuhan. Kami percaya kepada governansi korporat akan menumbuhkan kepercayaan yang kuat, baik dari peluanggan, investor maupun pemangku kepentingan lainnya. Pada tahun 2023 prinsipprinsip governansi korporat diterapkan pada semua organ Perseroan dan kami memastikan kepada aktivitas dan kebujakan Perseroan didasarkan pada nilai-nilai Perilaku Beretika, Akuntabilitas, Transparansi, dan Keberlanjutan.

Kami juga menjadi evaluasi atas;penerapan manajemen risiko dan systemd pengendalian internal agar sesuai dengan visi, misi dan strategi perusahaan, di sampengadopsip prinsip-prinsip governansi korporat dan mematuhi peraturan perdang-undangan dan standar yang berlaku. Berdasarkan evaluasi tersebut, kami menilai kepada manajemen risiko dan systemd pengendalian internal Perseroan tergolong memadai.

# IMPROVING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF CORPORATE GOVERNANCE

Corporate governance is essential to create an efficient and effective management system as well as sustainable corporate value. In managing resources and business, corporate governance is the foundation for implementing management responsibility. We are committed to taking a leadership role to achieve competitive governance outcomes, conducting business ethically, making a positive impact on society and the environment, enhancing survivability, and creating growth. We are confident that implementing corporate governance will foster strong trust from customers, investors, and other stakeholders. In 2023, the principles of corporate governance will be applied to all organs of the Company, and we will ensure that every activity and policy of the Company is based on the values of Ethical Behavior, Accountability, Transparency, and Sustainability.

We also evaluated the implementation of risk management and internal control systems to align with the Company's vision, mission, and strategy, in addition to adopting corporate governance principles and complying with prevailing laws and standards. Based on this evaluation, we assessed that the Company's risk management and internal control systems are adequate.

# Pembagian Dividen

Sebagai bagiandari penerapang governansikorporat, Perseroan secara konsisten memberikan imbal telah kepada pemegang saham. Berdasarkan keputusan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS) Tahunan tanggal 27 Juni 2023, Perseroan membagikan dividen tunai sebesar Rp15 per saham atauparaftar total Rp278 miliar dari laba bersih konsolidasi tahun 2022 sebesar Rp1,9 triliun dengan rasio pembayaran dividend (Dividend Pay Out Ratio) sebesar  $14.9\%$  .Pembayaran dividen tunai ini telah dilaksanan pada tanggal 25 Juli 2023.

# Penarikan Saham Tresuri

RUPS Tahunan tanggal 27 Juli 2022 telah memutuskan untukpekukanan pengalihan atas 24.608.142 saham Odd Lot Perseroan tahun 2017 (saham tresuri) terkait pelaksanaan merger PT Ciputra Surya Tbk dan PT Ciputra Property Tbk. Pada tanggal 24 Januari 2023 para pemegang saham Perseroan menceturjui penurunan modal ditempatkan dan disetor penuh Perseroan melalui penarikan saham tresuri. Pada tanggal 27 Maret 2023 Perseroanpekukanan penarikan kembali saham tresuri dan dengan demikian jumlah modal ditempatkan dan disetor Perseroan menjadi 18.535.695.255 saham, dari sebelumnya sebanyak 18.560.303.397 saham. Pengurangan modal ini telah mendapatkan persetujuan Bursa Efek Indonesia (BEI) melalui pengumuman No. Peng-P-00759/BEI.PP2/04-2023 dan berlaku efektif mulai tanggal 05 April 2023.

# PROSPEK BISNIS 2024

Pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia diprediksi telah akan berada pada level  $5\%$ . Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per kapita dan inflasi diproyeksikan relatif stabil. Di samping itu menc Gatnya kondisi相对较 dan pemulihan sentimen investor di Indonesia diharapkan memberikan dukungan positif untuk konsumsi dan investasi. Namun demikian, Indonesia sebagai memiliki kerentanan terhadap risiko eksternal, termasuk ketegangan geopolitik di Eropadan Timur Tengah dan fluktuasi di相对较 keuangan global. Tahun 2024 sebagai tahun politic juga membraca risiko tersendiri, meskipun proyeksianya tidak menuunjukan perubahan signifikan pada kebjikan ekonomi secara keseluruhan.

Di tengah berbagai tantangan yang telah berlanjut, Perseroan menghargai langkah proaktif Pemerintah dalam menerapkan kebikan untuk menciptakan stabilitas ekonomi. Koordinasi yang baik antara kebikan fskal dan moneter tetap mendukung pertumbuhan dan ketahanan ekonomi.

Untuk mendorong pertumbuhan industri properti, Pemerintah kembali menerbitkan insentif fiskal PPN DTP untuk penyerahan rumah tapak dan satuan rumah susun tingga Desember 2024. Pemerintah juga memperpanjang kebjakan relaksi rasio Loan to Value/Financing to Value (LTV/FTV) untuk kredit atas pembiayaan properti maksimal  $100 \%$ hingga 31 Desember 2024. Melalui berbagai kebjakan tersebut, pertumbuhan penjualan perumahan diproyeksikan akan mencaringkat sebesar  $5 \%$ hingga  $10 \%$  pada tahun 2024.

# Distribution of Dividends

As part of implementing corporate governance, the Company consistently provides returns to shareholders. Based on the decision of the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (AGMS) dated June 27, 2023, the Company distributed cash dividends of Rp15 per share or a total of Rp278 billion from the 2022 consolidated net profit of Rp1.9 trillion with a dividend payout ratio of  $14.9\%$ . This cash dividend payment was executed on July 25, 2023.

# Treasury Stock Withdrawal

The Annual GMS on July 27, 2022, has decided to transfer 24,608,142 Odd Lot shares of the Company in 2017 (treasury shares) related to the implementation of the merger of PT Ciputra Surya Tbk and PT Ciputra Property Tbk. On January 24, 2023, the Company's shareholders approved the decrease in the Company's issued and fully paid capital through the withdrawal of treasury shares. On March 27, 2023, the Company withdrew treasury shares, and thus, the total issued and paid-up capital of the Company became 18,535,695,255 shares from previously 18,560,303,397 shares. This capital reduction has been approved by the Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) through announcement No. Peng-P-00759/BEI.PP2/04-2023 and is effective starting April 05, 2023.

# 2024 BUSINESS PROSPECTS

Indonesia's economic growth is predicted to remain at the  $5\%$  level. Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita and inflation are projected to remain relatively stable. In addition, improving labor market conditions and recovering investor sentiment in Indonesia are expected to provide positive support for consumption and investment. Nevertheless, Indonesia remains vulnerable to external risks, including geopolitical tensions in Europe and the Middle East and fluctuations in global financial markets. The year 2024 as a political year also brings its own risks, although the projections do not indicate significant changes to overall economic policy.

Amidst the continuing challenges, the Company appreciates the Government's proactive measures in implementing policies to create economic stability. Good coordination between fiscal and monetary policies supports economic growth and resilience.

To encourage the growth of the property industry, the Government re-issued the VAT incentive for the delivery of landed houses and flats until December 2024. The government also extended the relaxation policy of the Loan to Value/Financing to Value (LTV/FTV) ratio for mortgage loan to a maximum of  $100\%$  until December 31, 2024. Through these various policies, housing sales growth is projected to increase by  $5\%$  to  $10\%$  in 2024.

Melanjutkan pencapaian rekor tertinggi pre-sales tahun 2023 sebesar Rp10,2 trilium, Perseroan menargetkan pertumbuhan pre-sales tahun 2024 sekitar  $8 \%$ menjadi Rp11,1 trilium yang terutama akan difokuskan pada segmentasi Produk dan lokasi yang selaras dengan kekuatan Perseroan. Perseroan akan Berkonsentrasi padaproduk-produk landed residential dan komersial yang terutama ditargetkan pada pengguna akhir (end-user) yang lebih resilien dengan kelompok pendapatan mengenhak ke atas. Posisi Perseroan sebagai pengembang properti (developer) yang paling terdiversifikasi secara geografis tetap menjadi telah situ keunggulan utama untuk memanfaatkan peluang pertumbuhan domestik dan mencatingkan pengenalan brand CIPUTRA di wilayah yang lebih luas. Perseroan juga akan melanjutkan ekspansi melalui kerja sama operasi dengan makukan launching 2 (dua) projekbaru di Sumatra dan Surabaya dan sekitarnya.

# Visi, Misi, dan Budaya Perusahaan

# Vision, Mission, and Corporate Culture

# Visi Vision

Mengembangkan menjadi grup bisnis properti dengan semangat yang Unggul dan penuh inovasi, Seeingga menciptakan nilai tambah dalam menyediakan kepada yang lebih baik bagi masyarakat dan memberikan kemakmuran dan kesejahteraan bagi para pemangku kepentingan.

![](images/7d06b30afef803dde5a5f47b48aa689385b1a05e87585b75d4bcd1ff3b7fdd72.jpg)

To develop a property business group that strives on excellence and innovation, thereby creating value added to provide a better life for the community as well as bringing welfare and prosperity for the stakeholders.

# Misi Mission

Menjadi yang terdepan dalam bisnis properti dengan menjadi yang paling Unggul, profesionai dan menguntungkan, sehingga kepada pengarih pertama bagi para konsumen, kepada tempat kerja yang paling menarik dan menantang bagi para karyawan, menjadi investasi yang paling menguntungkan bagi para pemegang saham dan menjadi berkat yang nyata bagi masyarakat dan Tanah Air.

![](images/ee4c4ba894cd94e4cdf2e8a58959304666b8245d44531d71902b561837b1ed7c.jpg)

To be in the forefront in the property sector by being the most trusted, professional, and profitable company, thereby becoming the first choice for the customers, a challenging yet rewarding workplace for the employees, the best investment for shareholders, and a real blessing for the community and the country.

Visi, Misi dan Budaya Perusahaan telah disetujui bersama oleh Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi pada tanggal 22 Oktober 2012. Setiap tahun dilakukan penelaahan atas Visi, Misi dan Budaya Perusahaan dan sampai akhir tahun 2023, Visi, Misi dan Budaya Perusahaanbelum mengalami perubahan.

The Company's Vision, Mission, and Corporate Culture were jointly approved by the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors on October 22, 2012. Every year, they were reviewed and until the end of 2023, there was no change in them.

# Sekilas Perseroan Company in Brief

![](images/e0cb3717ab71eab73a30d1df802bb31bb1a91799d0badcaf4c8b41705a0d9857.jpg)

Perusahaan properti publik sejak 1994 yang terus berinovasi dan beradaptasi dengan cepat.

A public property company since 1994 that continues to innovate and adapt quickly.

![](images/fd0d271ba2dbfee3bab92858e02c7031bee936288f4a0420be5445d8d708c8ee.jpg)

PT Ciputra Development Tbk (Perseroan) didirikan pada oleh Dr. (HC). Ir. Ciputra (Alm.) beserta keluarga pada tanggal 22 Oktober 1981 denganNama PT Citra Habitat Indonesia, yang pada tahun 1991 bergantiNama menjadi PT Ciputra Development.

Perseroan mencatatkan sahamnya di Bursa Efek Indonesia (saat itu masih Bursa Efek Jakarta) melalui Penawaran Umum Perdana (Initial Public Offering/IPO) pada tahun 1994 dengan kode saham CTRA. Selanjutnya pada tahun 1999 PT Ciputra Surya, anak perusahaan, juga menjadi perusahaan publik dengan kode saham CTRS, yang diikuti oleh PT Ciputra Property yang makukan IPO dan menjadi perusahaan publik dengan kode saham CTRP pada tahun 2007. Pada bulan Oktober 2016, Perseroan bersama-sama dengan CTRS dan CTRP mencampaikan rencana penggabungan usaha, yang memperoleh pernyataan efektif dari Otoritas Jasa Keuangan pada tanggal 23 Desember 2016 dan kemudian dilanjutkan dengan penandatanganan Akta Penggabungan pada tanggal 12 Januari 2017.

Sebagai perusaan yang berkomitmen dalam mengembangkan Produk properti yang Unggul dan berkualitas bagi para konsumen, Perseroan secara konsisten makukanncyagai inovasi dan terobosan tersebut untuk menciptakan konsep yangunik, menarik, dan modern di seluruhproduk properti residenial maupun komersial yang dikembangkan. Perseroan jugaBERkomitmen melakukan pengembangan properti berkelanjutan dengan tetap mengedepankan nilainilai Integritas, Profesionalisme dan Entrepreneurship, sebagai wujud tanggung jawab Perseroan di bidang

PT Ciputra Development Tbk (the Company) was established by Dr. (HC). Ciputra (late) and his family on October 22, 1981 under the name PT Citra Habitat Indonesia, which in 1991 changed its name to PT Ciputra Development.

The Company listed its shares on the Indonesia Stock Exchange (when it was still the Jakarta Stock Exchange) through an Initial Public Offering (IPO) in 1994 with CTRA stock code. Furthermore, in 1999 PT Ciputra Surya, a subsidiary, also became a public company with CTRS ticker code, followed by PT Ciputra Property which conducted an IPO and became a public company with CTRP ticker code in 2007. In October 2016, the Company together with CTRS and CTRP submitted a business merger plan, which obtained an effective statement from the Financial Services Authority on December 23, 2016 and then continued with the signing of the Deed of Merger on January 12, 2017.

As a company committed to developing superior and quality property products for consumers, the Company consistently makes the latest innovations and breakthroughs to create unique, attractive, and modern concepts in all developed residential and commercial property products. The Company is also committed to sustainable property development by prioritizing the values of Integrity, Professionalism, and Entrepreneurship as a form of the Company's responsibility in the environmental, social, and governance fields. The Company also

lingkungan, sosial dan tata kelola. Menghadapi era digital soit ini, Perseroan juga memanfaatkan tekologi dengan memperkuat layanan digital, mulai dari segi pemasaran (marketing), penjalan (sales) sampai dengan layanan purnajual (after sales service). Semua ini diyakini akan mendorong penciptaan nilai yang pada akhirnya tercermin pada peningkatan kinerja Perseroan.

Sampai akhir Desember 2023, Perseroan berhasil mengembangkan telah dari 87 projek, yang terdiri dari perumahan berskala kota, apartemen, gedung perkantoran, pusat perbelanjaan, hotel, rumah sakit, dan lapangan golf di 34 kota di seluruh Indonesia. Melalui mencapaian ini, Perseroan mengukuhkan posisinya sebagai perusahaan properti terdepan yang paling terdiversifikasi di Indonesia.

utilizes technology in the current digital era by strengthening digital services, ranging from marketing sales to after-sales service. This encourages value creation, ultimately reflected in the Company's improved performance.

By the end of December 2023, the Company had successfully developed more than 87 projects, consisting of township-scale housing, apartments, office buildings, shopping centers, hotels, hospitals, and golf courses in 34 cities across Indonesia. Through this achievement, the Company solidified its position as the most diversified leading property company in Indonesia.

# Kegiatan Usaha

# Business Activities

![](images/00ac0f81cec3cdd4222f1cbfb4854412d0c15c5c1e5c3e3076421ca0358b8731.jpg)

# Perseroan
mengelompokkan
bisnisnya menjadi dual:

Residensial  
- Properti Komersial

# The Company categorize its business into two:

Residential  
- Commercial Property

Secara umum kegiatan usaha Perseroan terdiri atas pengembangan proyek residenial, khususnya yang berskala kota (township residential) serta pengembangandan pengelolaan properti komersial.

Adapun Produk residencial PerseroanSEA   
seara umum mencakup kaveling tanah,   
rumah hunian, ruko, apartemen, dan   
perkantoran strata title. Sedangkan pengembangan dan pengelolaan   
properti komersial meliputi penyewaan pusat perbelanjaan ataupusat niaga, hotel, apartemen, perkantoran, rumah sakit, lapangan golf, dan waterpark.

Dari segi pendapatan, Perseroan membrukukan pendapatan—as penjalan Produk residential dan pendapatan usaha berulang (recurring income)—as penyewaan pusat niaga, hotel, perkantoran dan sebagainya.

In general, the Company's business activities consist of developing residential projects, particularly township residential, and developing and managing commercial properties.

The Company's residential products generally include land lots, residential houses, shophouses, apartments, and strata title offices. Meanwhile, commercial property development and management includes leasing shopping centers or malls, hotels, apartments, offices, hospitals, golf courses, and water parks.

The Company recorded revenue from the sale of residential products and recurring income from the rental of malls, hotels, offices and so on.

CitraGarden Serpong yang diluncurkan pada bulan Februari 2023 merupakan pengembangan residenial berskala kota (township development) melalui skema kerja sama operasi di ataslahan seleus total 350 hektare. Pada的前提下 mengusung konsep Green Development, CitraGarden Serpong menawarkan hunian keluarga di township yang memiliki nilai berkelanjutan dengan mengintegrasikan individu, komunitas dan lingkungan hijau. CitraGarden Serpong yang berlokasi di sebelum barat Jakarta, memiliki kemudahan akses (1 untuk dari stasium kereta api Cisauk dan 10 untuk dari tol Jakarta-Serpong) dan akses terbaik menuju fasilitas sekitar dan Jakarta, menjadikanya pilihan tersebut sebagai "A New Living Experience". CitraGarden Serpong ditujukan bagi masyarakat segmen mencah bawah sampai dengan mencenghas atas.

CitraGarden Serpong, launched in February 2023, is a township development through a joint operation scheme on a total land area of 350 hectares. In the first phase, 120 hectares of land will be developed, consisting of residential houses and shophouses. With the concept of Green Development, CitraGarden Serpong offers family residences in a township with sustainable values by integrating individuals, communities, and a green environment. Located in the west of Jakarta, CitraGarden Serpong has easy access (1 minute from Cisauk train station and 10 minutes from Jakarta-Serpong toll road) and the best access to surrounding facilities and Jakarta, making it the right choice as "A New Living Experience". CitraGarden Serpong is aimed at society's lower-middle to upper-middle segments.

Kawasan ini dikelilingi oleh perbukitan hijau yang tenang dan lapangan golf seesingga menciptakan susana nyaman, asri, jauh dari hiruk-pikuk perkotaan dan mencatkan kualitas hidup penghuninya. Dengan lokasi yang juga berada di kawasan komersial yang mature dancemudahan akses 4,5 km dari exit tol Sentul Selatan, Citra City Sentul menawarkan perpaduanunik antara Alam dan kehidupan perkotaan. Selainanyak ditujukan bagi masyarakat segmen menengah bawah sampai dengan menengah atas denganarga yang terjangkau, Citra City Sentul juga menawarkan Produk premium dengan pemandangan menghadap lapangan golf dengan kasaranarga antara Rp4,5 miliar tingga Rp6,2 miliar.

Through its subsidiary, PT Ciputra Residence, the Company launched Citra City Sentul, a new 400 hectares residential area in Sentul, south of Jakarta, in October 2023. The location is surrounded by serene green hills and golf courses, creating a cozy, beautiful atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle of the city and improving the quality of life of its residents. With its location in a mature commercial area and easy access  $4.5\mathrm{km}$  from the South Sentul toll exit, Citra City Sentul offers a unique blend of nature and urban living. In addition to catering to the lower middle to upper middle segments at affordable prices, Citra City Sentul also offers premium products with views overlooking the golf course, with a price range between Rp4.5 billion and Rp6.2 billion.

CitraGarden Bintaro tersebut proyek residencial yang menawarkan hunian bergaya Eropa modern yang menginepepankan ketenangan, lingkungan hijau dan kedekatan dengan Alam, terinspirasi oleh keindahan kepada botani (botanical garden) tropis. Dengan lokasi yang strategis ekat tol Jakarta-Serpong, 10menit Berkendara menuju fasilitas Bintaro city dan 35menit berkendara menuju Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta, CitraGarden Bintaro juga menawarkan konektivitas dan aksesibilas yang unggul. CitraGarden Bintaro akan dilengkapi dengan serangkaian fasilitas eksklusif yang komprehensif, di antaranya kolam renang, pusat kebugaran indoor, taman bermain anak-anak, club house, lapangan basket dan ruang terbuka hijau. Ditujukan bagi konsumen segmen mengalah bawah sampai dengan mengalah atas, CitraGarden Bintaro yang di-launch pada bulan November 2023 akan dikembangkan di ataslahan seleus 28 hektare.

CitraGarden Bintaro is a residential project offering modern European-style residences emphasizing tranquility, a green environment, and closeness to nature. The beauty of tropical botanical gardens inspires it. Strategically located near the Jakarta-Serpong highway, a 10-minute drive to Bintaro city amenities, and a 35-minute drive to Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, CitraGarden Bintaro also offers superior connectivity and accessibility. CitraGarden Bintaro will have a comprehensive set of exclusive facilities, including a swimming pool, indoor fitness center, children's playground, clubhouse, basketball court, and green open space. CitraGarden Bintaro, launched in November 2023, will be developed on 28 hectares of land aimed at the lower-middle to upper-middle segment.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komisaris Independen

Statement of Independence of Independent Commissioner

Bapak Kodradi, Bapak Tanan Herwandi Antonius, dan Bapak Thomas Bambang yang telah ditunjuk kembali sebagai Komisaris Independen Perseroan berdasarkan Akta No. 31 tertanggal 11 Agustus 2022, telah secara resmi menjadi independensi mereka. Pernyataan independensi ini disahkan melalui penandatanganan Surat Pernyataan Independen pada tanggal 28 Juli 2022. Pernyataan tersebut merupakan wujud komitmen Perseroan dalam mematuhi ketentuan Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 33/POJK.04/2014 mengenai Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik.

Mr. Kodradi, Mr. Tanan Herwandi Antonius, and Mr. Thomas Bambang who have been reappointed as Independent Commissioners of the Company based on Deed No. 31 dated 11 August 2022, have formally declared their independence. This declaration of independence was ratified through the signing of an Independent Declaration Letter on July 28, 2022. The statement is a form of the Company's commitment to comply with the provisions of the Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 33/ POJK.04/2014 regarding the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.

# Sumber Daya Manusia Human Resources

Perseroan bergomitmen untuk menc Gatkan kualitas sumber daya manusia (SDM) untuk memberikan kontribusi signifikan terhadap kemajuan perusahaan. Mayoritas karyawan yang berada pada usia produktif mampu mendorong Perusahaan melalui pengalaman dan keterampilan yang kuat. Dari tahun ke tahun, Perseroan juga berusa hatuk merempertahankan workplace diversity agar tercipta lingkungan kerja yang adil, setara, dan tidak bias.

Demi menciptakan SDM yang Ungul dan berlandaskan IPE (integritas, professionnelisme, dan entrepreneurship), Perseroan secara berkala memberikan pelatihan bagi karyawan baik untuk mengasah keterampilan teknis maupun keterampilan lunak. Perseroan juga konsisten dalam menerapkan pedoman dan nilai-nilai Perusahaan dalam menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang sehat, inklusif, danproduktif.

Hingga 31 Desember 2023, jumlah kanyakan Perseroan mencapai 4.574 orang, bertumbuh sebesar  $4 \%$ dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya yakni 4.413 orang.

The Company is committed to improve the quality of its Human Resources (HR) to make a significant contribution to the Company's progress. Most employees of productive age are able to drive the Company through strong experience and skills. From year to year, the Company also strives to maintain workplace diversity to create a fair, equal, and unbiased work environment.

To create superior HR based on IPE (integrity, professionalism, and entrepreneurship), the Company regularly trains employees to hone technical and soft skills. The Company also consistently implements its guidelines and values to create a healthy, inclusive, and productive work environment.

As of December 31, 2023, the Company's total number of employees reached 4,574 people, growing over  $4\%$  compared to the previous year of 4,413 people.

# PROGRAM KESEJAHTERAAN KARYAWAN

Program kesejahteraan karyawan merupakan kunci utama untuk menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang tersebut, inklusif, dan produktif. Berdasarkan komitmen berkelanjutan, Perseroan menyediakan fasilitas penunjang speerti fasilitas kesehatan, transportasi, dan rekreasi. Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan terus melanjutkan program kesejahteraan karyawan diperluas, termasuk peningkatan struktur gaji dan fasilitas kesehatan, mencakup asuransi kesehatan, BPJS Kesehatan, dan BPJS Ketenagakerjaan.

# EVALUASI KINERJA KARYAWAN

Demimeningkatkankualitaskerija, Perseroanmenerapkan evaluasi kinerja karyawan secara berkesinambungan. Program penilaian berbasis kompetensi dan Key Performance Indicator (KPI) telah diterapkan-Sejak 2018, membrantu manajemen dalam memberikan umpan balik kepada karyawan serta menentukan promosi, kenaikan gaji, atas bonus sesuai dengan kinerja yang terukur.

# EMPLOYEE WELFARERPROMAG

Employee welfare programs are key to creating a healthy, inclusive and productive work environment. Based on an ongoing commitment, the Company provides supporting facilities such as healthcare, transportation, and recreation. In 2023, the Company will continue to expand the employee welfare program, including improvements to the salary structure and health facilities, including health insurance, BPJS Health, and BPJS Employment.

# EMPLOYEE PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT

To improve performance quality, the Company implements continuous employee performance evaluation. The competency-based assessment program and Key Performance Indicator (KPI) have been implemented since 2018, assisting management in providing feedback to employees as well as determining promotions, salary increases, or bonuses in accordance with measurable performance.

# Tinjauan Makroekonomi dan Industri Macroeconomics and Industry Review

Tahun 2023 adalah tahun yang penuh tantangan bagi perekonomian global. Meskipun pandemi telah berakhir, namun pengintaran tensi geopolitik akibat perang Rusia-Ukraine dan konflik Palestine-Israel yang menghambat laju perdagangan global, fenomena El Nino dan perubahan iklim yang mencywabkan kenaikan hari komoditasangan global dan inflasi yang mempengaruhi kebujakan moneter di banyak negara menjadikan ketidakpastian ekonomi global tetap tinggi. Bank Dunia dalam layoran Global Economic Prospect bulan Januari 2024 melaporkan pertumbuhan perekonomian global pada tahun 2023 sebesar  $2,6\%$ .

Secara domestik fundamental ekonomi Indonesia tetap solid. Hal ini ditunjukkan oleh angka pertumbuhan ekonomi yang secara konsisten berada di atas  $5 \%$  (yoy) selama tujuhkuartal berturut-turut sejak akhir 2021, melambat dengan orangat moderat menjadi  $4,94 \%$  (yoy) pada kuartal III tahun 2023 dan kembali tercatat tumbuh  $5,04 \%$  (yoy) pada kuartal IV. Ekonomi Indonesia tahun 2023 mencatat pertumbuhan sebesar  $5,05 \%$  (yoy), terutama ditopang oleh permintaandomestik. Inflasi terjaga stabil dan terkendali dengan tingkat optimisme masyarakat yang tinggi berdasarkan Indeks Keyakinan Konsumen. Aktivitas investasi tersebut didukung oleh perkembangan penyelesiaan Proyek Strategis Nasional (PSN) di samping adanya kebujakan fiskaldari Pemerintah untuk menjaga daya beli masyarakat.

Industri properti global sepanjang tahun 2023belum memperlihatkan pemulihan yang signifikan, dipicu oleh masih rendahnya permintaan akibat kenaikan tingkat sukumbunga dan melemahnya aktivitas ekonomi. Namun demikian, kondisi tersebut tidak secara langsung memengaru industri properti domestik. Di Indonesia, aktelerasi pemulihan ekonomi nasional menunjukkan tren yang positif sekaj awal tahun. Optimisme Pemerintah untuk menjaga pertumbuhan ekonomi sesuai target turut menjadi pelaku industri properti optimis. Selain itu dukungan melalui pemberian berbagai stimulus, di antaranya kebijakan kredit/ pembayaan properti menjadi maksimal  $100\%$  dan insentif Pajak Pertambahan Nilai Ditanggung Pemerintah (PPN DTP) mampu memberikan kontribusi yang signifikan pada industri properti, terutama pada pembangunan rumah hunian (landed residential) dan apartemen, sekalis gus membrantu masyarakat dalam mencari rumah hunian atas rumah pertama.

Hasil Survei Harga Properti Residensial (SHPR) Bank Indonesia mengindikasikan pengkitan惠及 properti residenial di pasar primer selema tahun 2023. Ini terlihat dari pertumbuhan Indeks Harga Properti Residensial (IHPR) kuartal-IV 2023 yang mencapat  $1,74\%$  (yoy), sedikit melambat dibandingkan kuartal-III yang tercatat  $1,96\%$ . Penjualan properti residenial di pasar primernya untuk jukutan pengkitan. Pada kuartal-IV penjualan properti residenial tercatat tambuh  $3,27\%$  (yoy), membaik dari kuartal-III yang tercatat mengalami kontraksi

2023 is still a year full of challenges for the global economy. Even though the pandemic has ended, increasing geopolitical tensions due to the Russian-Ukrainian war and the Palestinian-Israeli conflict which hampered the pace of global trade, the El Nino phenomenon and climate change, which caused global food commodity prices to rise, and inflation, which affected monetary policy in many countries created global economic uncertainty remains high. The World Bank, in its Global Economic Prospect report in January 2024, reported global economic growth in 2023 of  $2.6\%$ .

Domestically, Indonesia's economic fundamentals remain strong. This is demonstrated by economic growth statistics, which have been above  $5\%$  (yoy) for seven quarters running since the end of 2021. In the third quarter of 2023, growth was  $4.94\%$  (yoy), a very mild slowdown, and in the fourth quarter, growth of  $5.04\%$  (yoy) was recorded. The Indonesian economy is expected to grow by  $5.05\%$  (yoy) in 2023, primarily due to domestic demand. Based on the Consumer Confidence Index, which measures public optimism, inflation is kept steady and controlled. Investment activity strengthened, supported by progress in completing the National Strategic Project (PSN) in addition to fiscal policies from the Government to maintain people's purchasing power.

The global property industry throughout 2023 has not shown a significant recovery triggered by low demand due to the rising of interest rates and weakening economic activity. However, these conditions do not directly affect the domestic property industry. In Indonesia, the acceleration of national economic recovery has shown a positive trend since the beginning of the year. The Government's optimism in maintaining economic growth according to targets has also made property industry players optimistic. Apart from that, support through the provision of various stimuli, including property credit/financing policies to a maximum of  $100\%$  and VAT incentives, can make a significant contribution to the property industry, especially in the construction of landed residential and apartments, as well as helping people in looking for a residential home or first home.

The Bank Indonesia Residential Property Price Survey (SHPR) results indicate an increase in residential property prices in the primary market during 2023. This can be seen from the Residential Property Price Index (IHPR) growth for the fourth quarter of 2023, which increased by  $1.74\%$  (yoy), slightly slower than the third quarter, which was recorded at  $1.96\%$ . Residential property sales in the primary market also showed an increase. In the fourth quarter, residential property sales grew  $3.27\%$  (yoy), improving

# Tinjauan Operasi per Segmen Usaha Operational Review by Business Segment

Kegiatan usaha Perseroanteringi ke dalam dua segmen, yaitu:

# 1. Residensial

Segmen yang,melengkupi pengembangan perumahan dan properti lain yang dijual,termasuk di antaranya penyediaan tanah,pengembangan kawasan yang terintegrasi lengkap dengan infrastruktur dan fasilitas umum,penjuan dan pengelolaan kawasan perumahan tapak(landed house)danpenjalan apartemen dan ruang perkantoran strata-title(high rise).

# 2. Properti Komersial

Segmen yang,melengkupi pengembangan dan pengelolaan pusat perbelanjaan, hotel, apartemen dan ruang perkantoran yang disewakan,serta lapangan golf dan rumah sakit.

# RESIDENSIAL

Perseroan Selalu mempertimbangkan berbagai macam faktor secara komprehensif dalam menentukan kelayakan lokasi pengembangan residenial. Hal tersebut selain penting dalam mencapatkan profabilitas Perseroan, juga penting dalam memberikan peluangan ruang hidup yang berkesinambungan. Faktor-faktor yang dipertimbangkan Perseroan di antaranya pembebasan dan status hukum lahan, ketersediaan pembiayaan, tidak pembelian, aksesibilitas dan infrastruktur pendukung, kelayakan pengembangan atas lahan, target konsumen, kondisi pasar dan pembatasan dari Pemerintah/Otoritas.

# PENYEDIAAN LAHAN

Perseroan seksuistik mengkanyak jaringan bisnisnya dalam mendapatkan lahan potensial dan secara bertahap makukanan akuisisi atas lahan yang dinilai strategis, baik secara opportunty maupun biayanya. Berdasarkan peraturan terkait perolehan lahan, Perseroan memperoleh hak pengembangan lahan dari Pemerintah setempat yang memberikan hak eksklusif untuk mengakuisi lahan sesuai dengan hak pengembangan perusahaan. Perseroan selanjutnya makukanan negosiasi dengan pemilik tanah dan kemudian menghubungti kantor pertanahan untuk memperoleh hak kepemilikan tanah secara legal setelah proses pembelian lahan selesai.

The Company's business activities are divided into two segments, namely:

# 1. Residential

A segment that encompasses the development of housing and other properties for sale, including land provision, integrated regional development equipped with public infrastructure and facilities, sales and management of landed houses and the sale of apartments and strata titled office spaces (high rise).

# 2. Commercial Property

A segment that encompasses the development and management of shopping centers, hotels, apartments and office spaces for rent, as well as golf courses and hospitals.

# RESIDENTIAL

The Company always considers a comprehensive range of factors in determining the feasibility of residential development locations. This is not only important for improving the Company's profitability but also for providing customers with a sustainable living space. Factors that the Company considers include land acquisition and legal status, financing availability, purchase price, accessibility and supporting infrastructure, feasibility of land development, target customers, market conditions, and Government/ Authority restrictions.

# LAND PROVISION

The Company utilizes its business network to obtain potential land and gradually acquires land that is considered strategic, both in its opportunity and cost. Based on the land acquisition regulations, the Company obtains land development rights from the local government, which gives it the exclusive right to acquire land under the Company's development rights. The Company then negotiates with the land owner and contacts the land office to obtain legal land ownership rights after the completion of the land purchase process.

Aspek-aspek tersebut meliputi pengembangan bisnis, desain arsitektur dan interior, pengelolaan projek, teknik penjualan serta pemasaran melalui sumber daya internal yang didukung dengan layanan eksternal yang kapabel,seperti arsitektur, konstruksi dan manajemen. Sebagai upaya dalam mengoptimalkan perencanaan dan pengembangan projek, Perseroan juga mencatkan kemampuan dengan senantiasa menerapkan best practice perencanaan dan pengembangan projek menjadi sehingga menciptakan kepuasan bagi peluanggan.

Perseroan membrutuk tim perencanaan projek dengan tanggung jawab untuk membuat konsep setup projek yang akan memenuhi kebutuhan dan harapan peluangan melalui perumusan desain, arsitektur dan penggunaan material. # PROJECT PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT

Over 40 years of experience as a developer has helped the Company to create an optimized, effective and efficient project planning and development workflow. These aspects include business development, architectural and interior design, project management, sales, and marketing techniques through internal resources supported by capable external services, such as architecture, construction, and management. To optimize project planning and development, the Company also enhances its capabilities by constantly applying best practices in project planning and development to provide satisfaction to its customers.

The Company established a project planning team responsible for conceptualizing each project that will meet the needs and expectations of customers through the formulation of design, architecture, and material usage. Regarding the architectural and design aspects, the Company invites internationally renowned architects and interior designers to design modern and quality designs, along with local architects and interior designers to ensure the designs are following applicable regulations. At this stage, the Company obtains approvals, licenses, environmental permits, and construction.

# CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT

Once the project concept and design have been agreed upon, the Company commences project construction and development by coordinating with the planning and marketing teams. The construction and development process is executed by independent contractors determined by the Company based on several factors, including price, licensed qualifications, financial status, reliability, track record, and ability to commit to completion targets with quality results. Every project launched by the Company will always prioritize collaboration to produce quality work. The Company together with professional consultants will conduct strict supervision and monitoring during the construction and development process to ensure that the quality and technical standards are in accordance with what has been determined.

Advertising is generally done through television and radio, print, billboards and the project website. The Company also implements digital technology in its marketing strategy by offering units using the Hybrid 360 Virtual Marketing Gallery Experience. # SALES

The Company continues promoting digital transformation across all areas, including sales. During the COVID-19 pandemic, the Company launched digital sales initiatives through virtual tours, digital seminars, and online product knowledge. After the pandemic ended, the Company started to re-optimize its on-site sales offices, placing sales representatives in each project who can assist incoming customers directly. The Company is also involved in property exhibitions when launching projects using independent sales and marketing agents.

Regarding property sales, the Company generally conducts marketing sales (pre-sale), where the Company sells the property before construction is completed, with the proceeds from the pre-sale being used to build the property.

The Company offers three payment methods to buyers: cash, Home Ownership Credit (KPR) or Apartment Ownership Credit (KPA) and through installments. For some projects, the Company also offers a balloon/hybrid payment method that allows buyers to pay  $20 - 50\%$  of the sales transaction value within 2-3 years through installments and the rest through KPR/KPA or cash.

The Company generally provides discounts tailored to the type of payment the customer chooses. These pricing options are designed to encourage cash sales by remain flexible in providing discounts while maintaining profit targets. Buyers can also use bank financing (KPR). The Company accepts home mortgage disbursements based on the construction progress in the field, as proof by certificates. This is evidence of the Company's compliance with regulations related to home mortgage disbursements by banks to developers.

An installment payment option is also available, allowing the buyer to pay a portion of the purchase price (typically around  $15\%$ ) within two months after signing the property reservation form. The outstanding amount will become a debt that must be paid in equal monthly installments. To minimize the requirement for construction financing for each development, the Company creates installment plans that guarantee the construction costs will be fully funded at each stage of development.

Selama menjadi tahun terakhir, KPR telah menjadi metode pembayaran untuk pre-sale Perseroan dengan proporsi terbesar. Hal tersebut tidak dapat dipisahkan dari ketersediaan KPR dan tingginya proporsi pembeli pengguna akhir (end-user). Setelah secara historis properti denganarga per unit sampai dengan Rp2 miliar mendominasi pre-sale, sejak tahun 2022, unit denganarga di atas Rp2 miliar mulai mendominasi pre-sale. Selama tahun 2023,unit denganarga per unit sampai dengan Rp2 miliar mengkontribusi  $47\%$  pre-sales sementara kontribusi dariunit denganarga di atas Rp2 miliar sebesar  $53\%$  .Sebagianburasari pre-sales yang berasil dari segmen menengah ini memilikiarga per unit yang berkisar antara Rp1-3 miliar.

Atas pembeli yang gagal memenuhi kewajiban angsuranya, Perseroan berhak untuk membatalkan kontrak penjalan dan menjual kembali properti tanpa proses penyitaan terlebih dahulu. Perseroan juga memiliki hak untuk menahan sebagian dari pembayaran yang telah dilakukan pembeli sebelum gagalayar terjadi. Perseroan tidak mengalami default tersebut dalam/beberapa tahun terakhir.

Penentuan tidak menyesuaikan tidak paracing yang berlaku pada saat transaksi penjalan dengan pemungkanan menc gunakan tidak premium. Perseroan biasanya membrangun properti secara bertahap untuk memberikan fleksibilitas dalam mengubah penawaran dengan mencukti permintaan paracing. Faktor-faktor yang dapat mempengaruhi nilai penjalan dari pengembangan proyek Barang adalah menjadi properti yang dikembangkan, waktu penyelesaian dan waktu pengakuan pendapatan.

Untuk projek-proyekbaru,jidah properti yang difjual dan waktu penyerahan properti kepada pembeli tergantung pada jadwal konstruksi dan tanggapanasar atas peluncuran projek Barang tersebut serta tingkat permintaan yang terkait dengan demografiasar,seperti urbanisasi maupun perubahan lifestyle untuk tinggal di dalam kota agar lebih dekat dengan aktivitas bisnis dan tempat kerja.

Pada segmen residenial, Perseroan telah mengembangkan kawasan dengan luas lebih dari 5.600 hektar tanah dan menjual lebih dari 145.000 unit rumah dan kondominium serta  $150.000\mathrm{m}^2$  ruang perkantoran.

Over the past few years, KPR has remained as the payment method for the Company's pre-sales with the most significant proportion. This can not be separated from the availability of mortgages and the high proportion of end-user. Historically, properties with prices per unit of up to Rp2 billion dominated pre-sales, but since 2022, units with prices above Rp2 billion will begin to dominate pre-sales. During 2023, units with a per unit price of up to Rp2 billion contribute  $47\%$  of pre-sales, while the contribution from units with a price above Rp2 billion is  $53\%$ . Most pre-sales from the middle segment have prices per unit ranging between Rp1-3 billion.

The Company can cancel the sales contract and resell the property without prior confiscation for buyers who fail to fulfill their installment obligations. The Company also has the right to withhold part of the buyer's payment before the default occurs. The Company has not experienced significant defaults in recent years.

The selling price is determined according to the prevailing market price at the time of the sales transaction with the possibility of using a premium price. The Company usually develops properties in phases to gain the flexibility to change offerings by following market demand. Factors that can affect the sales value of new project development are the type of property developed, the timing of completion, and the timing of revenue recognition.

For new projects, the number of properties sold and the timing of delivery of properties to buyers depends on the construction schedule and market response, as well as the level of demand related to market demographics, such as urbanization and lifestyle changes to live in cities closer to business centers and workplaces.

In the residential segment, the Company has developed more than 5,600 hectares of land and sold more than 145,000 units of houses and condominiums and  $150,000\mathrm{m}^2$  of office space.

Perseroan pada tahun 2023 mencapai rekor tertinggi sepanjang menjadi dengan mencatat pre-sales sebesar Rp10.241,3 miliar, tumbuh  $24\%$  dari tahun 2022 (Rp8.243,4 miliar) dan mencapai  $105\%$  dari target yang ditetapkan sebesar Rp9.775,0 miliar. Pencapaian ini terutama didukung oleh kesuksesan launching portfolio proyek Perseroan di lokasi strategis di seluruh Indonesia. Selain itu, insentif PPN DTP yang diberlakukan kembali pada bulan November 2023 juga mendukung pencapaian pre-sales Perseroan dengan kontribusi sebesar Rp768,5 miliar. Selama tahun 2023 terjadi kenaikan tingkat suku bunga acuan Bank Indonesia (BI rate) sebesar 50 basis poin, namun tingkat siku bunga KPR为主线 stabil dan KPR tetap kepada metode pembayaran utama dari pelanggan dengan kontribusinya sebesar  $63\%$  dari total pre-sales.

The Company's pre-sales of Rp10,241.3 billion in 2023 marked a record high, up  $24\%$  from Rp8,243.4 billion in 2022 and reached  $105\%$  of the target of Rp9,775.0 billion. The Company's project portfolio was successfully launched in key Indonesian locations, which served as the primary driver of this accomplishment. In addition, the VAT Incentive, reinstated in November 2023, contributed Rp768.5 billion to the Company's pre-sales accomplishments. The Bank Indonesia benchmark interest rate (BI rate) rose by 50 basis points in 2023. However, KPR interest rates are still comparatively stable, and customers primarily use KPR for payment, accounting for  $63\%$  of all pre-sales.

# KERJA SAMA OPERASI

Selain seksualkan pengelolaan sendiri atas sebagian beschappi yang dikembangkan, Perseroan juga seksualkan joint venture/joint operations/partnership dengan pihak ketiga, khususnya untuk pengembangan properti di luar Jakarta dan Surabaya. Partnership (kemitraan) bisnis dijalankan melalui skema penyediaan lahan oleh partner, sementara Perseroan bertanggung jawab untuk kegiatan pengembangan, pembangunan dan penjalan projek tersebut. Melalui skema kemitraan ini, Perseroan dapat mengakses lahan dengan lokasi strategis, mendapatkan pengetahuan teknik dan network lokal sehingga dapat memberikan kontribusi yang lebih signifikan terhadap bisnis Perseroan.

Sebelum memulai kemitraan, Perseroan menjadi uji kelayakan (due diligence) baik terhadap partner potensial maupun peluang pembebasanlah yang mungskin terjadi guna memastikan oleh projek-proyek kerja sama yang akan dilaksanan memiliki standar yang serupa dengan projek yang dikembangkan secara oleh Perseroan. Proyek-proyek yang dikembangkan oleh Perseroan melalui skema partnership diantaranya telah Ciputra World Surabaya (CWS) dan Ciputra International Jakarta.

# JOINT VENTURES/JOINT OPERATIONS

Besides self-managing most of the developed properties, the Company also conducts joint ventures/joint operations/ partnerships with third parties, particularly for property development outside Jakarta and Surabaya. The business partnership is carried out through a scheme of land provision by the partner, with the Company responsible for the development, construction, and sales of the project. Through the partnership scheme, the Company can access strategic land, gain technical knowledge, and local networks to make a more significant contribution to the Company's business.

Before entering into a partnership, the Company will conduct due diligence for both potential partners and possibility of land acquisition opportunities to ensure that the implementation of the partnership projects has similar standards to those developed by the Company. Projects developed by the Company through partnership schemes include Ciputra World Surabaya (CWS) and Ciputra International Jakarta.
