# THE GMS IN 2022

In 2022, the Company held 1 (one) Annual GMS and did not hold an Extraordinary GMS. The AGMS was held on Wednesday, July 27, 2022, at Ciputra Artpreneur, Lotte Shopping Avenue Level 11, Ciputra World 1 Jakarta, JI. Prof. DR. Satrio Kav. 3-5, Karet Kuningan, South Jakarta 12940. The AGMS was attended by all 6 (six) members of the Board of Commissioners and 9 (nine) out of 10 (ten) members of

Direksi berjumlah 9 (sembilan) orang dari 10 (sepuluh) orang, baik secara fisik maupun virtual melalui konferensi video.

Dalam pelaksanaannya RUPS Tahunan dihadiri/diwakili oleh seabanyak 14.303.118.070 (empat belas miliar tiga ratus tiga juta seratus delapan belas ribu tujuh puluh) saham atau sejumlah  $77,17\%$  (tujuh puluh tujuh koma sutujuh persen) dari seluruh jumlah saham dengan hak suara.

Agar acara Rapat dapat berlangsung efektif, Perseroan memberikan kesempatan kepada peserta rapat untuk mengajukan pertanyaan dan pendapat, kemudian dilanjutan pengambilan keputusan. Apabila musyawarah mufakat tidak tercapai, makai dilakukan dengan pemungutan suara. Untuk proses penghitungan suara dan validasinya, Perseroan menunjuk pihak independen, yaitu PT EDI Indonesia selaku Biro Administrrasi Efek dan Buntario Tigris, S.H., S.E., M.H., Notaris di Jakarta. Adapun RUPST tersebut telah menghasilkan keputusan-keputusan sebagai berikut:

the Board of Directors, both physically and virtually via video conference.

# Tata cara pembayaran dividend tunai:

a. Pemberitahuan ini merupakan pemberitahuan resmi dari Perseroan dan Perseroan tidak mengeluarkan surat pemberitahuan secara khusus kepada para pemegang saham.  
b. Dividen tunai akan diberikan kepada para pemegang saham yang namanya tercatat dalam Daftar Pemegang Saham Perseroan atau pemegang rekening efek dalam penitipan kolektif PT Kustodian Sentral Efek Indonesia (KSEI) pada penutupan perdangan saham di Bursa Efek Indonesia pada tanggal 8 Agustus 2022.  
c. Bagi pemegang saham yang sahamnya dalam penitipan kolektif KSEI, dividen tunai akan disampaikan oleh Perseroan melalui KSEI kepada perusahaan efek atas bank kustodian, di mana pemegang saham membruka rekeningnya.  
d. Bagi pemegang saham warkat, Perseroan akan melaksananakan pembayaran dividemelalui pemindahbukuan ke rekening bank yang telah disampaikan pemegang saham kepada Perseroan secara tertulis, lengkap dan jelas di atas materai Rp10.000 (sepuluh ribu rupiah), disertai fotokopi Kartu Tanda Penduduk sesuaiNama dan Alamat yang tercatat dalam Daftar Pemegang Saham, ke Alamat Perseroan:

# Procedures for the payment of cash dividend:

a. This notice shall constitute the official announcement by from the Company and the Company shall not issue any specific notification to the shareholders.  
b. Cash dividend shall be made to the shareholders whose names are recorded in the Register of Shareholders of the Company or the holders of security account with the collective custody of PT Kustodian Sentral Efek Indonesia (KSEI) on the closing of trade in Indonesia Stock Exchange on August 8, 2022.  
c. For the shareholders having their shares kept with KSEI's collective custody, their cash dividend shall be distributed by the Company via KSEI to the securities company or custodian bank in which such shareholders opened their account.  
d. For the shareholders having script shares, the Company shall make the dividend payment by transfer to the bank account notified by the shareholders to the Company in writing, complete and clear form over Rp10,000 (ten thousand Rupiah) stamp duty, together with the copy of Identity Card pursuant to the name and address recorded in the Register of Shareholders, to the Company:

# Dewan Komisaris

# Board of Commissioners

# DASAR HUKUM

Dewan Komisaris adalah organ yang mengawasi kinerja Direksi. Dewan Komisaris minimal terdiri dari 2 (dua) orang dengan tugas untuk mengawasi kebujakan yang difalankan oleh Direksi, memberikan arahan dan nasihat kepada Direksi, dan memastikan pengerapan governansi korporat yang efektif dan berkelanjutan.

Dewan Komisaris memiliki kewenangan untuk menjadi laporan telah pengawasan kepada pemegang saham. Secara hukum, masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris memilikikedudukan yang setara. Namun, Komisaris Utama memiliki kewenangan untuk mencoordinasikan kerja Dewan Komisaris dan menuyampaikan pendapat dewan kepada Direksi dan pemegang saham.

Dalam bekerja, Dewan Komisaris mematuhi dan berpedoman kepada:

1. Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 33/ POJK.04/204ARPentang Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten ata Perusahaan Publik.  
2. Undang-undang Republik Indonesia No. 40 Tahun 2007 ingin Perseroan Terbatas.  
3. Pedoman Umum Governansi Korporat Indonesia 2021 dari Komite Nasional Kebijakan Governansi.  
4. Pedoman Komisaris.

# PEDOMAN KERJA (BOARD CHARTER)

Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris merupakan dokumen yang menjelaskan tugas, tanggung jawab, dan aturan yang harus diikuti oleh Dewan Komisaris di Perseroan. Pedoman ini telah ditetapkan, disahkan di depan pemegang saham, dan diumumkan kepada publik melalui situs web resmi Perseroan. Dengan adanya Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris, Perseroan berharap dapat memastikan pengelolaan yang baik dalam mencapai tujuan seesingga bisa bersaing dengan efisien dan efektif, serta tetap mempertahankan posisi terdepan di dalam persaingan yang semakin ketat.

Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris tersebut hal-hal berikut:

1. Persyaratan Dewan Komisaris.  
2. Rangkap Jabatan Dewan Komisaris.  
3. Tugas, Wewenang, dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris.  
4. Waktu Kerja Dewan Komisaris.  
5. Kebijakan Rapat Dewan Komisaris.  
6. Pelaporandan Pertanggungjawaban Dewan Komisaris.  
7. Pengunduran Diri.

# LEGAL BASIS

The Board of Commissioners oversees the Board of Directors' performance. The Board of Commissioners comprises a minimum of 2 (two) individuals, and its responsibilities include overseeing the policies put in place by the Board of Directors, providing direction and advice to the Board of Directors, and ensuring the implementation of efficient and sustainable corporate governance.

The Board of Commissioners has the authority to provide supervisory reports to shareholders. Every Commissioner has the same standing under the law. Nonetheless, the President Commissioner can direct the Board of Commissioners' activities and represent the board's views to the shareholders and Board of Directors.

In its work, the Board of Commissioners complies with and is guided by:

1. Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/204 concerning Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.  
2. Law of the Republic of Indonesia no. 40 of 2007 concerning Limited Liability Companies.  
3. General Guidelines for Indonesian Corporate Governance 2021 from the National Committee for Governance Policy.  
4. The Board of Commissioners Charter.

# BOARD CHARTER

The Board of Commissioners Charter is a document that explains the duties, responsibilities, and rules that the Board of Commissioners must follow within the Company. These policies have been developed, approved by shareholders, and made available to the general public through the Company's official website. The Company hopes to maintain its leading position in an increasingly competitive market by ensuring good management in attaining its goals and competing effectively through the Board of Commissioners' Charter.

The Board Charter for the Board of Commissioners stipulates the following matters:

1. Requirements of the Board of Commissioners.  
2. Concurrent Positions of the Board of Commissioners.  
3. Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners.  
4. Working Time of the Board of Commissioners.  
5. Policy of the Board of Commissioners Meeting.  
6. Reporting and Accountability of the Board of Commissioners.  
7. Resignation.

# TUGAS, WEWENANG, DAN TANGGUNG JAWAB

Di dalam Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris, tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dijelaskan. Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris perlu dikelola dan diawasi dengan baik untuk menjamin kelangsungan Perseroan. Berikut adalah rincian tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris:

# Tugas

1. Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris bertugas inginawasi dan mempertanggungjawabkan pengawasan atas kebikan pengurusan, jalanya pengurusan pada umumnya, baik mengenai Perseroan maupun kinerja Perseroan, serta pemberian nasihat kepada Direksi.  
2. Dewan Komisaris wajib menyelenggaramakan RUPS Tahunan dan RUPS lainnya jika dibutuhkan sesuai dengan kewenangannya sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan anggaran dasar.  
3. Anggota Dewan Komisaris wajib melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawab dengan itikad baik, penuh tanggung jawab, dan kehati-hatian.  
4. Dalam rangka mendukung efektivitas pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya Dewan Komisaris wajib membrutuk Komite Audit dan dapat membrutuk komite lainnya.  
5. Dewan Komisaris wajib seksukan evaluasi terhadap kinerja komite yang membantu pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya setiap akhir tahun buku.

# Wewenang

1. Anggota Dewan Komisaris wajib melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawab dengan itikad baik, penuh tanggung jawab, dan kehati-hatian.  
2. Dalam rangka mendukung efektivitas pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya Dewan Komisaris wajib membrentuk Komite Audit dan dapat membrentuk komite lainnya.  
3. Dewan Komisaris wajib seksukan evaluasi terhadap kinerja komite yang membantu pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya setup akhir tahun buku.

# Tanggung Jawab

1. Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris bertanggung jawab secara tanggung renteng atas kerugian Perseroan yang disebabkan oleh kesalahanan ata kalalian anggota Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan tugasnya.  
2. Anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak dapat diminta bertanggung jawab atas kerugian Perseroan sebagai dimaksud pada ayat (1) apabila dapat membuktikan:

a. Kerugian thereby bukan karena kesalahan ata kalalaiannya;

# DUTIES, AUTHORITIES, AND RESPONSIBILITIES

The Board of Commissioners' duties, authorities, and responsibilities are defined in the Board of Commissioners' Charter. The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners need to be managed and supervised well to ensure the continuity of the Company. The following are details of the duties, authorities, and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners:

# Duties

1. Each member of the Board of Commissioners is responsible to supervise and accountable for the supervision of the management policies, general course of management, both regarding the Company and its business, and provide advice to the Board of Directors.  
2. The Board of Commissioners is required to hold the Annual GMS and other GMS if needed in accordance with its authority as stipulated in the laws and regulations, as well as the Articles of Association.  
3. Members of the Board of Commissioners must carry out their duties and responsibilities in good faith, full of responsibility, and with prudence.  
4. In order to support the effectiveness of the implementation of its duties and responsibilities, the Board of Commissioners is required to establish an Audit Committee and may establish other committees as well.  
5. The Board of Commissioners is required to evaluate the performance of the board committees which assist its duties and responsibilities at the end of each financial year.

# Authorities

1. Members of the Board of Commissioners must carry out their duties and responsibilities in good faith, with full responsibility and prudence.  
2. To support the effective implementation of its duties and responsibilities, the Board of Commissioners is obliged to form an Audit Committee and can create other committees.  
3. The Board of Commissioners must evaluate the performance of committees that assist in carrying out their duties and responsibilities at the end of each financial year.

# Responsibilities

1. Each member of the Board of Commissioners is jointly and severally responsible for the Company's losses caused by the mistakes or negligence of members of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out their duties.  
2. Member of the Board of Commissioners cannot be held responsible for the loss of the Company as referred to in paragraph (1) if they can prove:

a. The loss is not due to his/her fault or negligence;

b. Telah seksukan pengawasan dengan itikad baik,摄入 tanggung jawab, dan kehati-hatian untuk kepentingan dan sesuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perseroan;  
c. Tidak mempunyai benturan kepentingan baik langsung maupun tidak langsung atas tindakan pengawasan yang mengakibatkan kerugian; dan  
d. Telah mencambil tinkakan untuk mencegah timbul atau berlanjutnya kerugian tersebut.

# PENGANGKATAN DAN PEMBERHENTIAN

Pemegang saham berpartisipasi secara aktif dengan memberikan suara terpisah untuk memilih anggota Dewan Komisaris. Proses pemilihan ini dilakukan dengan persetujuan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham dan telahnilaya dilaporkan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK).

Anggota Dewan Komisaris perlu memenuhi darüber kriteria termasuk integritas, pengalaman yang sesuai, dan kemampuan untuk bekerja secara independen. Calon anggota Dewan Komisaris juga harus memahami nilai-nilai Perseroan, etika kerja, Anggaran Dasar, serta peraturan yang relevant dengan tugasnya di dalam;pemerapan governansi korporat.

Dewan Komisaris dapat berhenti karena berbagaialan,seperti berakhirnya masa jabatan, pensiun, tidak memenuhi persyaratan, mencgal, ataup diputuskan oleh Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS). Jika anggota Dewan Komisaris ingin mengundurkan diri sebelum masa jabatannya berakhir, anggota Dewan Komisaris harus mengajukan permohonan kepada Perseroan. Kemudian, Perseroan harus menyelenggaramakan RUPS dalam waktu 90 hari setelah menerima permohonan pengunduran diri tersebut. Perseroan juga harus memberi tahun publik dan melaporkan kepada OJK dalam 2 hari kerja setelah menerima permohonan pengunduran diri,{serta telah RUPS.

# KOMPOSISI DAN NASA JABATAN

Komposisi Dewan Komisaris terkini ditentukan berdasarkan telah RUPST 2023 pada tanggal 27 Juni 2023 dengan jumlah 6 (enam) anggota yang terdiri dari; 1 (satu) orang Komisaris Utama, 2 (dua) orang Komisaris, dan 3 (tiga) orang Komisaris Independen. Komposisi Dewan Komisaris tersebut disahkan dengan mematuhi peraturan-peraturan yang berlaku, khususnya POJK No. 33 tahun 2014. Masa jabatan anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat berakhir apabila anggota terkait mengundurkan diri, tidak lagi memenuhi persyaratan, mencgal dunia, seda diberhentikan berdasarkan keputusan RUPS.

Komposisi Dewan Komisaris per 31 Desember 2023 telah sebagai berikut:

b. Has carried out supervision in good faith, full of responsibility, and prudence for the benefit and in accordance with the aims and objectives of the Company;  
c. Does not have a conflict of interest, either directly or indirectly, over supervisory actions that result in losses; and  
d. Has taken action to prevent the occurrence or continuation of the loss.

# APPOINTMENT AND DISMISSAL

Shareholders actively participate by voting separately to elect members of the Board of Commissioners. The General Meeting of Shareholders has approved this election process, and the Financial Services Authority (OJK) is informed of the results.

Members of the Board of Commissioners require several qualifications, including integrity, relevant experience, and the ability to work independently. Regarding their responsibilities in conducting corporate governance, prospective members of the Board of Commissioners must also be aware of the Company's values, work ethics, Articles of Association, and regulations.

The Board of Commissioners may resign for various reasons, including the end of their term of office, retirement, failure to meet the requirements, death, or a decision by the General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS). A member of the Board of Commissioners must notify the Company to leave the Board before their term of office ends. Within 90 days of receiving the resignation request, the Company is required to hold a GMS. After receiving the resignation request and the GMS results, the Company is also required to inform the public and report to the OJK within 2 working days.

# COMPOSITION AND TERM OF OFFICE

The current composition of the Board of Commissioners is determined by the results of the 2023 AGMS on June, 27, 2023, with a total of 6 (six) members, including 1 (one) President Commissioner, 2 (two) Commissioners, and 3 (three) Independent Commissioners. The Board of Commissioners' composition was confirmed by adhering to relevant laws, particularly POJK No. 33 of 2014. If a member of the Board of Commissioners resigns, ceases to be eligible, passes away, or is removed by a GMS decision, their term of office will automatically expire.

# KOMISARIS INDEPENDEN

# Dasar Hukum

Komisaris Independen adalah anggota Dewan Komisaris yang tidak memiliki ikatan khusus dengan pemegang saham mayoritas atas manajemen perusahaan. Dewan Komisaris menunjuk Komisaris Independen atas komisaris Independen senior (jika ada lebih dari tahun) untuk mengemban tugas-tugas Komisaris Utama yang memiligi potensi benturan kepentingan.

Tugas-tugas lain Komisaris Independen itial ah memberikan pandangan independen, memantau kinerja manajemen, dan melindungi kepentingan pemegang saham minoritas. Komisaris Independen harus bersal dari luar Perseroan dan memenuhi kriteria sebagai Komisaris Independen. Untuk menjalankan tugasnya dengan baik sesuai prinsip governansi korporat, Komisaris Independen tidak boleh memiliki hubungan finansial, tepengurusan, tepemilikan saham, ata keluarga dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, ata pemegang saham pengendali yang biasa menimbulkan benturan kepentingan.

Komisaris Independen Perseroan mematuhi dan berpedoman kepadaphisperatauran di antaranya:

- POJK No. 33/POJK.04/204 tentative Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik.  
- PUGKI 2021 yang diterbitkan Komite Nasional Kebijakan Governansi (KNKG)  
- Pedoman Komisaris.

# Kriteria Penentuan

Komisaris Independenden wajib memenuhi persyaratan pada sama diangkat dan selama menjadi sebagai berikut:

1. Bukan merupakan orang yang bekerja oleh mempunyai wewenang dan tanggung jawab untuk merencanakan, memimpin, mengendalianan, oleh mengawasi kegiatan Perseroan dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir, kecuali untuk pengangkatan kembali sebagai Komisaris Independen Perseroan padaperiode berikutnya;  
2. Tidak mempunyai saham baik langsung maupun tidak langsung pada perusahaan tersebut;

# INDEPENDENT COMMISSIONER

# Legal Basis

Independent Commissioners are members of the Board of Commissioners without direct ties to the majority shareholders or company management. When the President Commissioner has potential conflicts of interest, the Board of Commissioners appoints an Independent Commissioner, or senior Independent Commissioner, if there are multiple Independent Commissioners.

Other responsibilities of the Independent Commissioner include providing independent opinions, monitoring management performance, and protecting the interests of minority shareholders. Independent Commissioners are required to be independent and to have come from outside the Company. Independent Commissioners must not have any financial, managerial, share ownership, or familial ties to members of the Board of Commissioners, Directors, or controlling shareholders that might create a conflict of interest in performing their duties effectively and in line with corporate governance principles.

The Company's Independent Commissioners comply with and are guided by several regulations, including:

- POJK No. 33/POJK.04/204 concerning Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.  
PUGKI 2021 published by the National Committee for Governance Policy (KNKG)  
The Board of Commissioners Charter.

# Criteria of Appointment

Independent Commissioners shall meet the following requirements at the time of appointment and during the term of office:

1. Not the individual who work or have authority and responsibility for planning, leading, controlling or supervising the Company activities within 6 (six) months, except for the reappointment as Commissioner Independent of the Company in the next period;  
2. Not own any shares either directly or indirectly on the company;

3. Tidak mempunyai hubungan afliasi dengan Perseroan, anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Direksi, atau pemegang saham utama Perseroan tersebut; dan  
4. Tidak mempunyai hubungan usaha baik langsung maupun tidak langsung yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha perusahaan tersebut.

# Komposisi dan Masa Jabatan

Perseroan mematuhi POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 entwickling Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik yang menenetapkan oleh komposisi Komisaris Independen harus minimal  $30\%$  dari total jumlah anggota Dewan Komisaris. Untuk tahun 2023, komposisi Komisaris Independen sudah memenuhi peraturan tersebut.

Komisaris Independen memiliki mesa jabatan maksimal Selama 2periode berturut-turut. Komisaris Independen dapat diangkat kembali untuk periode berikutnya, tetapi harus mencyawan diri tetap independen kepada RUPS. Namun, jika Komisaris Independen juga menjabat sebagai Komite Audit, Komisaris Independen telah dapat diangkat kembali sebagai Komite Audit untuk 1periode berikutnya.

# PERNYATAAN INDEPENDENSI

Setiap Komisaris Independen telah menandatangani pernyataan independensi yang terus diperbarui secara bergala, sesuai dengan POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 dan SEOJK No. 16 /SEOJK.04/2021. Pernyataan ini mencakup hal-hal sebagai berikut:

3. Not have any affiliation with the Company, member of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Board of Directors, or the Company's majority shareholder; and  
4. Not have any direct or indirect business relationship related to the Company's business.

# Composition and Term of Office

The Company complies with POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, concerning the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies that stipulates the composition of Independent Commissioners which must be at least  $30\%$  of the total members of the Board of Commissioners. For 2023, the composition of the Independent Commissioners meets these regulations.

Independent Commissioners have a maximum term of office of 2 consecutive terms. Independent Commissioners can be reappointed for the next period but must declare themselves independent of the GMS. However, if the Independent Commissioner also serves on the Audit Committee, the Independent Commissioner can only be reappointed to the Audit Committee for 1 subsequent period.

# PROGRAM PENGEMBANGAN KEAHLIAN DEWAN KOMISARIS

Sepanjang tahun 2023 tidak ada program peningkatan kompetensi baik berupa workshop, pelatihan maupun pengembangan keahlian yang diikuti oleh Dewan Komisaris, namun demikian Dewan Komisaris Berkomitmen untuk menjaga dan mencatingkatkan kemampuannya secara proaktif.

# PENILAIAN ATAS KINERJA KOMITE AUDIT

Dewan Komisaris secara rutin seksukan penilaian kinerja Komite Audit. Penilaian ini dilakukan untuk memantau kepada Komite Audit telah menjalankan tugasnya dengan baik, yaitu membrantu Dewan Komisaris mengawasi pelaksanaan fungsi Direksi dalam pengelolaan Perseroan. Dalam seksukan penilaian, Dewan Komisaris mencungenkan prosedur yang sistematis dan objektif. Penilaian ini berpedoman pada prinsip-prinsip tata kelola perusahaan dan Piagam Komite Audit.

Prosedur penilaian kerja yang difalankan Dewan Komisaris meliputi bereits takapan, yakni:

- Penyusunan indicator kinerja;  
- Pengumpulan data-data kinerja;  
- Analisis data-data kinerja; dan  
Penilaian kinerja.

Merujuk Piagam Komite Audit, Dewan Komisaris memiliki,—beberapa kriteria penilaian, di antaranya:

- Kepatuhan kode etik Komite Audit yang ditetapkan Perseroan;  
- Sikap independensi dalam bekerja selama tahun buku;  
- Capaian kinerja selama tahun buku;  
Kualitas rekomendasi dan pendapat independen yang diberikan selama tahun buku;  
Kompetensi; dan  
- Kehadiran dalam rapat.

# PELAKSANAAN TUGAS DEWAN KOMISARIS

Dewan Komisaris merupakan organ perusahaan yang bertanggung jawab dalam membuat kebikan dan pengelolaan perusahaan yang difalankan Direksi. Selama tahun buku 2023, Dewan Komisaris melaksanan tugasnya dengan rincian tersebut berikut:

1. Memberikan arahan dan masukan bagi Direksi dalam memastikan keselarasan kebikan strategis dengan visi dan misi Perseroan.  
2. Dewan Komisaris wajib menyelenggaraman RUPS tahunan dan RUPS lainnya seksuai dengan kewenangannya sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan anggaran dasar.

# COMPETENCY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM OF BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS

Throughout 2023, there are no competency improvement programs in the form of workshops, training, or skill development that will be participated in by the Board of Commissioners. However, the Board of Commissioners is committed to proactively maintaining and improving its capabilities.

# PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT OF AUDIT COMMITTEE

The Board of Commissioners routinely assesses the performance of the Audit Committee. This assessment is conducted to examine whether the Audit Committee has carried out its duties well, particularly supporting the Board of Commissioners to oversee the implementation of the Board of Directors' function in managing the Company. In conducting assessments, the Board of Commissioners uses systematic and objective procedures. The principles of corporate governance and the Audit Committee Charter guide this assessment.

The work assessment procedure conducted by the Board of Commissioners includes several stages, namely:

Preparation of performance indicators;  
Collection of performance data;  
Analysis of performance data; and  
Performance assessment.

Referring to the Audit Committee Charter, the Board of Commissioners has several assessment criteria, including:

- Compliance with the Audit Committee code of ethics established by the Company;  
- Independent attitude in working during the financial year;  
Performance achievements during the financial year;  
- Quality of recommendations and independent opinions provided during the financial year;  
Competence; and  
- Attendance at meetings.

# IMPLEMENTATION OF THE BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS' DUTIES

The Board of Commissioners is a corporate organ responsible for overseeing the policies and management of the company conducted by the Board of Directors. Throughout the 2023 financial year, the Board of Commissioners carried out its duties with the following details:

1. To advise and provide input to the Board of Directors in ensuring the alignment of strategic policies with the Company's vision and mission.  
2. The Board of Commissioners is obliged to organize the annual GMS and other GMS following its authority as stipulated in the laws and regulations and the articles of association.

3. Mengevaluasi kinerja Direksi dan memastikan Direksi melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya dengan baik.  
4. Menyelenggaraman rapat Dewan Komisaris secara bergala untuk membahas dan memutuskan isu-isupenting Perseroan.  
5. Dewan Komisaris wajib seksukan evaluasi terhadap kinerja komite yang membantu pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya setup akhir tahun buku.

3. To evaluate the performance of the Board of Directors and ensure that the Board of Directors performs its duties and responsibilities properly.  
4. To organize regular Board of Commissioners meetings to discuss and resolve important issues of the Company.  
5. The Board of Commissioners is required to evaluate the performance of the committees that assist in carrying out their duties and responsibilities at the end of each financial year.

# Direksi

# Board of Directors

# DASAR HUKUM

Direksi adalah pimpinan perusahaan yang bertanggung jawab menjalankan kegiatan usaha sehari-hari dan memastikan kelangsungan usaha perusahaan untuk jangka panjang. Direksi juga harus mematuhi ketentuan anggaran dasar Perseroan, Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan, Peraturan Bursa, seda peraturan perundang-undangan di bidang Perseroan Terbatas dan bidang Pasar Modal.

Sebagai organ pengelolaan, Direksi bertugas dan bertanggung jawab secara kolegial dalam mengelola Perseroan. Setiap anggota Direksi memiliki tugas dan tanggung jawabnya masing-masing sesuai dengan kompetensi dan kemampuannya. Direktur Utama bertanggung jawab untuk mencoordinasikan seluruh anggota Direksi agar setiap keputusan yang diambil dapat dipertanggungjawabkan bersama.

Dalam bekerja, Direksi mematuhi dan berpedoman kepada:

1. Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 33/ POJK.04/204zoek Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik.  
2. Undang-undang Republik Indonesia No. 40 Tahun 2007tentang Perseroan Terbatas.  
3. Pedoman Umum Govnansi Korporat Indonesia 2021 dari Komite Nasional Kebijakan Govnansi.  
4. Pedoman Direksi.

# PEDOMAN KERJA

Untuk menerapkan governansi korporat yang baik, Direksi selalu bekerja dengan integritas, terstruktur, dan systematis, sesuai dengan Pedoman Kerja Direksi. Beberapa aspek di dalam Pedoman Kerja Direksi meliputi:

1. Persyaratan Direksi;  
2. Rangkap Jabatan Direksi;  
3. Tugas, Wewenang, dan Tanggung Jawab Direksi;

# LEGAL BASIS

The Board of Directors are company leaders responsible for carrying out daily business activities and ensuring the long-term continuity of the company's business. The Board of Directors must also comply with the provisions of the Company's articles of association, Financial Services Authority Regulations, Stock Exchange Regulations, and laws and regulations in the Limited Liability Company and Capital Market sectors.

The Board of Directors is responsible and collegial in the management of the Company. Depending on their skills and qualifications, each board of Directors member has specific roles and responsibilities. For the Board of Directors to be held collectively accountable for every decision made, the President Director organizes the other members.

In working, the Board of Directors adheres to and is guided by:

1. Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/204 concerning Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.  
2. Law of the Republic of Indonesia no. 40 of 2007 concerning Limited Liability Companies.  
3. General Guidelines for Indonesian Corporate Governance 2021 from the National Committee for Governance Policy.  
4. The Board of Directors Charter.

# BOARD CHARTER

To implement good corporate governance, the Board of Directors always works with integrity, structure, and systematicity, as outlined in the Board of Directors Charter. The Board of Directors Charter cover several topics, including:

1. Requirements of the Board of Directors;  
2. Concurrent Positions of the Board of Directors;  
3. Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities of the Board of Directors;

4. Waktu Kerja Direksi;  
5. Kebijakan Rapat Direksi;  
6. Pelaporan dan Pertanggungjawaban Direksi; dan

7. Pengunduran Diri dan Pemberhentian Sementara.

Sebagai komitmen Perseroan dalam mematuhi peraturan perundang-undangan, informasi mengenai Pedoman Kerja dapat diakses oleh publik melalui situs web Perseroan.

# TUGAS, WEWENANG, DAN TANGGUNG JAWAB

Setiap tugas dan tanggung jawab Direksi dalam mengelola Perseroan harus dilakukan dengan itikad baik, penuh tanggung jawab, dan hari-hati. Agar pelaksanaan tugas berjalan dengan baik, Perseroan menetapkan pembagian tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab untuk setiap Direksi sesuai Pedoman Kerja Direksi, dengan penjabaran sebagai perikut:

# Tugas

1. Direksi bertugas menjalankan dan bertanggung jawab ataspengurusanPerseroanuntukkepentingan PerseroanSESuaidengamaksud dan tujuanPerseroan yang ditetapkan dalamAnggaranDasar.  
2. Dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawab atas pengurusan sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (1), Direksi wajib menyelenggarakan RUPS tahunan dan RUPS lainnya sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan anggaran dasar.  
3. Setiap anggota Direksi wajib melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawab sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (1) dengan itikad baik, penuh tanggung jawab, dan kehatian-hatian.  
4. Dalam rangka mendukung efektivitas pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (1) Direksi dapat mementuk komite.  
5. Dalam hal dibentuknya komite sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (4), Direksi wajib melakukan evaluasi terhadap kinerja komite setiap akhir tahun buku.

# Wewenang

1. Direksi berwenang menjalankan pengurusan sebagai dimaksud di atas, Sesuai dengan kebikan yang dipandang kepada serta maksud dan tujuan yang ditetapkan dalam Anggaran Dasar.  
2. Direksi berwenang mewakili Perseroan di dalam dan di luar pengadilan.  
3. Anggota Direksi tidak berwenang mewakili Perseroan apabila:

a. Terdapat perkara di pengadilan antara Perseroan dengan anggota Direksi yang bersangkutan; dan  
b. Anggota Direksi bersangkutan mempunyai kepentingan yang berbenturan dengan kepentingan Perseroan.

4. Working Time of the Board of Directors;  
5. Meeting Policies of the Board of Directors;  
6. Reporting and Accountability of the Board of Directors; and  
7. Resignation and Temporary Dismissal.

# DUTIES, AUTHORITIES, AND RESPONSIBILITIES

The Board of Directors shall manage the Company in good faith, fully responsible, and cautiously, fulfilling all of its duties and obligations. The following justification is provided by the Company when determining each Director's authority, responsibilities, and division of duties following the Board of Directors Charter so that they can effectively perform their duties:

# Duties

1. The Board of Directors is in charge of carrying out and being responsible for managing the Company for the Company interest in accordance with the purposes and objectives of the Company as stipulated in the articles of association.  
2. In carrying out its duties and responsibilities for the administration as referred to in verse (1), the Board of Directors shall hold the Annual GMS and other GMS as regulated in legislation and laws and Articles of Association.  
3. Each member of the Board of Directors shall perform his/her duties and responsibilities as referred to in verse (1) in good faith, full of responsibility, and prudent.  
4. In order to support the effectiveness of the duties and responsibilities implementation as referred to in verse (1) the Board of Directors may establish a committee.  
5. In terms of committee establishment as referred to in verse (4), the Board of Directors shall evaluate the performance of the Committee at the end of each financial year.

# Authorities

1. The Board of Directors is authorized to carry out the management as referred to above, in accordance with the applicable policies and the purposes and objectives as stipulated in the Articles of Association.  
2. The Board of Directors is authorized to represent the Company in and out of court.  
3. The members of the Board of Directors are not authorized to represent the Company if:

a. There is a court case between the Company and the involved member of the Board of Directors; and  
b. The members of the Board of Directors have a conflict of interest with the Company.

4. Apabila terdapat keadaan sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (3), yang berhak mewakili Perseroan adalah:

a. Anggota Direksi lainnya yang tidak mempunyai benturan kepada tingan dengan Perseroan;  
b. Dewan Komisaris apabilaituruh anggota Direksi mempunyai benturan kepentingan dengan Perseroan; atau  
c. Pihak lain yang ditunjuk oleh RUPS apabila seluruh anggota Direksi atas Dewan Komisaris mempunyai benturan kepada pengentingan dengan Perseroan.

# Tanggung Jawab

1. Setiap anggota Direksi bertanggung jawab secara bersama-sama之作 kerugian Perseroan yang disebabkan oleh kesalahan atas kalalian anggota Direksi dalam menjalankan tugasnya.  
2. Anggota Direksi tidak dapat diminta bertanggung jawab atas kerugian Perseroan sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (1) apabila dapat membuktikan:

a. Kerugian thereby bukan karena kesalahan ata kalalaiannya;  
b. Telah seksukan pengurusan dengan itikad baik, penuh tanggung jawab, dan kehati-hatian untuk kepentingan dan sesuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perseroan;  
c. Tidak mempunyai benturan kepentingan baik langsung maupun tidak langsung atas tindakan pengurusan yang>mengakibatkan kerugian; dan  
d. Telah;mengambil tindakan untuk mencegah timbul atau berlanjutnya kerugian tersebut.

Lalu untukugas dan tanggung jawab masing-masing Direktur secara spesiifik adalah sebagai berikut:

# Direktur Utama

1. Memimpin Dewan atau komite eksekutif yang ada di bawahnya.  
2. Bertindak(SEbagai pemimpin rapat umum.  
3. Bertindak-Sebagai perwakilan di luar Perseroan.

4. Berperan penting dalam menentukan komposisi Dewan dan sub-komite, sehen ga tercapai efektivitas dan keselarasan.  
5. Mengambil keputusan dalam rapat Direksi ata pada kondisi tertentu yang dianggap perlu.  
6. Melakukan penataan dan pengawasan terhadap seluruh kegiatan manajemen yang merupakan dasar dari seluruh systemd kegiatan dan kinerja Perseroan.  
7. Menetapkan pedoman dan mekanisme Perseroan yang ditata berdasarkan systemd manajemen umum yang terus Berkembang sebagai kontribusi terhadap kelancaran operasional Perseroan.

4. If the condition as referred to in verse (3) occurred, the right person in charge to represent the Company goes to:

a. Other members of the Board of Directors who do not have any conflict of interest with the Company;  
b. The Board of Commissioners if all members of the Board of Directors have a conflict of interest with the Company; or  
c. Other parties appointed by the GMS in the event a that all members of the Board of Directors or Board of Commissioners have a conflict of interest with the Company.

# Responsibilities

1. Each member of the Board of Directors shall be jointly liable for any Company loss caused by any failure or omission of the members of the Board of Directors in performing their duties.  
2. The members of Board of Directors shall not be liable for the Company loss as referred to in paragraph (1) if they could prove that:

a. The loss is not due to their errors or omissions;  
b. Each member of the Board of Directors has conducted management in good faith, full responsibility, and prudent for the interests and in accordance with the purposes and objectives of the Company;  
c. Each member of the Board of Directors does not have any direct or indirect conflicts of interest which result in a loss; and  
d. Each member of the Board of Directors has taken action to prevent the occurrence or extent of such losses.

Meanwhile the specific duties and responsibilities of each Director are as follows:

# President Director

1. Leading the entire board or executive committee.  
2. Acting as Chair of the general meeting.  
3. Acting as a representative in relation with the external parties.  
4. Having a significant role in determining the composition of the board and sub-committees, in order to achieve the harmony and effectiveness.  
5. Taking decisions in the Board of Directors' meeting or in certain condition if necessary.  
6. Managing and supervising all of the management activities that are the basis of the whole Company's activities and performances system.  
7. Establishing the Company's guidelines and mechanisms managed under the general management system which continuously grows as a contribution to the sustainability of all related department/divisions.

8. Memastikan ketersediaan informasi dan data untuk pelaporan sesuai dengan kebjaksanaan dan prosedur yang telah ditentukan sehubungan dengan anggaran dasar dan anggaran rumah tangga Perseroan yang meliputi konsep, fungsi penggerak, peraturan, prosedural dan systemd.  
9. Berkaitan dengan pengerapan hukum Perseroan.

# Direktur Pengelola

1. Melakukan koordinasi terhadap kerja divisi secara keseluruhan pada tahun tersebut sebagai konsep dasar dari keseluruhan kebujakan Perseroan.  
2. Merencanakan, melaksanakan, dan mengawasi divisi dengan berpedoman pada kelangsungan dan pengembangan Perseroan secara keseluruhan.  
3. Melakukan penataan dan pengawasan terhadap seluruh aktivitas divisi yang merupakan dasar strategi yang tak terpisahkan dari seluruh sistem kegiatan dan kinerja Perseroan.  
4. Merencanakan dan mengembangkan sumber-sumber pendapatan dan pembelanjaan divisi.  
5. Mengawasi, menilai, dan melaporkan hal-hal terkait dengan kinerja divisi.  
6. Menetapkan sasan manajemen secara konseptualtera berupaya mencapai target Perseroan dalammakukan pengaturan terhadap system manajemen operational/divisi.  
7. Menetapkan langkah strategis sehubungan dengan perumusan risiko yang berpotensi dihadapi Perseroan.  
8. Melakukan sinergi dan berusaha untuk meraih telah usaha yang optimal dari pelaksanaan seluruh kegiatan bisnis Perseroan.  
9. Memberi kepastian atas Dana operasional yang dibutuhkan untuk kegiatan operasional Perseroan.

# Direktur Operasi

1. Merencanakan, mengembangkan, dan menerapkan strategi terkait kegiatan operasional divisi.  
2. Menetapkan dan memelihara systemd untuk menjadi keseluruhan aspek penting di divisi.  
3. Terlibat langsung dalam mengelola dan mengembangkan operasional divisi.  
4. Berhubungan dengan hal-hal terkait pengembangan systemd, kualitas dan kuantitas divisi dan karyawan.  
5. Berhubungdengan keuangandivisi Perseroandalam bidang pembukuan, audit,istem penganggaran dan pembiayaan serta penjadwalan anggaran termasuk projeksi anggaran.  
6. Memberi kepastian之作 kelancaran kinerja manajemen pemasaran, penjualan, dan promosi{serta menginterpretasikan berbagai kebujakan dan prosedur divisi.  
7. Melakukan koordinasi dalam rangka mengurangi dan memitigasi berbagaijis risiko terkait operasional divisi.  
8. Memastikan setzenh divisi dan wilayah kerja mematuh kebujanan dan Standard Operating Procedure yang berlaku untuk masing-masing fungsi sesuai dengan rencana yang telah disetujui (business unit oversight).

8. Ensuring the availability of information and data for reporting, based on the policies and procedures determined and related to the Article of Associations and the Bylaws covering concepts, propulsion functions, regulatory, procedures, and system.  
9. Implementing law and regulation in the Company.

# Managing Director

1. Coordinating the divisional work as a whole in a system and strategy as the basic concept of the Company policy.  
2. Planning, implementing, and supervising the division based on the continuity and development of the Company as a whole.  
3. Structuring and supervising all divisional activities as a basis of inseparable strategy from entire system of activities and performance of the Company.  
4. Planning and developing the sources of division income and expenditure.  
5. Monitoring, assessing, and reporting matters related to divisional performance.  
6. Establishing management objectives conceptually and striving to achieve the Company's target in managing the operational/division management system.  
7. Establishing strategic steps regarding to the risk formulation that might be encountered by the Company.  
8. Synergizing and striving to achieve the best business results from implementation of the Company business activities.  
9. Determining the operational funds required for the Company operational activities.

# Director of Operation

1. Planning, developing, and implementing strategies related to division's operational activities.  
2. Establishing and maintaining the system to assess all main aspects of the division.  
3. Engaging directly in managing and developing division operations.  
4. Dealing with matters related to system development, quality and quantity of divisions and employees.  
5. Dealing with the Company's financial divisions in bookkeeping, auditing, unemployment systems and financing as well as budget scheduling including budget projections.  
6. Providing assurance of the smooth performance of marketing, sales, and promotion management as well as providing various division policies and procedures.  
7. Coordinating in order to reduce and mitigate various types of risks related to division operations.  
8. Ensuring all divisions and working areas to comply with the policies and Standard Operating Procedures that apply to each function in accordance with the approved plan (business unit oversight).

9. Memastikan tersebut pelaporan kepada Managing Director, Presiden Direktur, dan Dewan Komisaris dilakukan secara tepat waktu dan akurat.

# PENGANGKATAN DAN PEMBERHENTIAN

Dalam upayanya mengimplementasikan prinsip-prinsip governansi korporat, khususnya akuntabilitas, Perseroan secara Berkala dan berkesinambungan melaksanankan proses pengangkatan dan pemberhentian Direksi.

Dewan Komisaris"Atau komite yang menjalankan fungsi nominasi bertugas menentukan kandidat yang akan menjadi anggota Direksi. Dewan Komisaris dapat mencari kandidat dari berbagai sumber, termasuk Dewan Komisaris sendiri, manajemen perusahaan, pemegang saham mayoritas, ata sumber independen. Dalam menentukan kandidat Direksi, Dewan Komisaris harus memastikan kepada kandidat tersebut memiliki pengetahuan, kemampuan, dan keahlian yang dibutuhkan untuk menjalankan peran Direksi. Selain itu, Dewan Komisaris juga harus memperhatikan keberagaman Direksi,agar Perseroan dapat mengambil keputusan yang lebih baik.

Setelah menentukan kandidat, Dewan Komisaris akan mengajukanya kepada Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS) untuk diputuskan. Sesuai dengan POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, usulan penggangkatan, pemberhentian, dan/atau penggantian anggota Direksi harus memerhatikan rekomendasi dari Dewan Komisaris atas komite yang menjalankan fungsi nominasi.

Setelah terpilih, anggota Direksi dapat mengundurkan diri dari jabatanya sebelum命名为 jabatanya berakhir, oleh ketika mencipasi diania, dan biberhentikan melalui keputusan RUPS. Perseroan wajib menyelenggarakan RUPS untuk memutuskan permohonan pengunduran diri tersebut paling lambat 90 hari setelah diterimanya permohonan tersebut. Anggota Direksi dapat biberhentikan sementara oleh Dewan Komisaris dengan atas yang jelas. Anggota Direksi yang biberhentikan sementara tidak dapat menjalankan tugasnya sebagai anggota Direksi. Perseroan wajib menyampaikan informasi kepada masyarakat dan OJK paling lambat 2 hari kerja setelah diterimanya permohonan pengunduran diri Direksi dan telah penyelenggaraan RUPS.

# APPOINTMENT AND DISMISSAL

In its efforts to implement the principles of corporate governance, especially accountability, the Company periodically and continuously processes appointing and dismissing Directors.

The Board of Commissioners or any committee that conducts the nomination function is responsible for selecting candidates for the Board of Directors. The majority shareholders, the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Commissioners itself, and independent sources are among the sources from which the Board of Commissioners may select candidates. The Board of Commissioners must ensure that individuals nominated for Director have the qualifications necessary to perform the position's duties. Beyond that, for the Company to make better decisions, the Board of Commissioners must also consider the diversity of the Board of Directors.

After selecting a candidate, the Board of Commissioners will submit it to the General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS) for approval. POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 states that recommendations from the Board of Commissioners or the committee responsible for nominations must be considered when proposing the appointment, removal, or replacement of a member of the Board of Directors.

Members of the Board of Directors may step down from their positions at any time after being elected, either before the end of their term in office or upon their passing away and dismissal by the GMS. The company is obliged to hold a GMS to decide on the resignation request by 90 days after receiving the request. The Board of Commissioners can temporarily dismiss members of the Board of Directors for apparent reasons. Members of the Board of Directors who are temporarily dismissed cannot carry out their duties as members of the Board of Directors. The Company is obliged to convey information to the public and the OJK within 2 working days after receiving the request for the resignation of the Directors and the results of the GMS.

Perseroan terus berupaya mencatingkatkan kinerja dan pengelolaan perusahaan melalui program pengembangan keahlian Direksi yang berkelanjutan. Perseroan memiliki program pengenalan bagi anggota Direksi Barang yang bertujuan untuk memberikan pemahaman awal tersebut nilai-nilai dan aturan perusahaan, Seeinga Direksi dapat bekerja secara optimal.

Anggota Direksi secara rutin juga menerima informasi yang akurat dan terkini tentang peraturan perundang-undangan, standar yang relevant, kewajiban lainnya, faktor risiko, dan lingkungan bisnis perusahaan Seeingga dapat membantu Direksi dalam membuat keputusan yang tepat, mengelola risiko dengan baik, seda menjaga kepadahan dan kinerja optimal dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawab.

Untuk tahun 2023 ini, program pelatihan yang diikuti oleh anggota Direksi Perseroan adalah sebagai berikut:

# COMPETENCY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS

The Company is committed to improving its performance and management through a long-term Directors' expertise development program. # PENILAIAN ATAS KINERJA KOMITE DI BAWAH DIREKSI

Sampai dengan akhir tahun 2023, Perseroanbelow membranymemembentuk komite yang beroperasi di bawah Direksi. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan tidak dapat memberikan informasi mengenai penilaian kinerja komite di bawah Direksi pada periode tersebut.

# PELAKSANAAN TUGAS DIREKSI

Direksi sebagai organ yang bertanggungjawab penuh terhadap pengelolaan Perseroan memiliki tugas yang telah ditetapkan sesuai dengan peraturan perundang-undangan. Selama tahun buku 2023, Direksi melaksanan tugasnya dengan rincian sebagai berikut:

1. Menyusun dan melaksanakan kebikan strategis Perusahaan.  
2. Menyelenggaramakan pengelolaan operational Perusahaan secara efisien dan efektif.  
3. Menyelenggaraman RUPS tahunan sebagai diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan anggaran dasar.  
4. Menyusun anggaran dan mengelola keuang Perusaan secara bijak dan bertanggung jawab.

# PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT OF COMMITTEES UNDER THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS

As of the end of 2023, the Company has yet to form a committee that operates under the Board of Directors. Therefore, the Company cannot provide information regarding the performance assessment of committees under the Board of Directors during that period.

# IMPLEMENTATION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS' DUTIES

The Board of Directors' responsibilities have been established by laws and regulations because it is the organ wholly accountable for the Company's management. The following are the specifics of how the Board of Directors carried out its duties during the 2023 financial year:

1. To formulate and implement the Company's strategic policies.  
2. To organize the Company's operational management efficiently and effectively.  
3. To organize an annual GMS as regulated in the statutory regulations and articles of association.  
4. To budget and manage the Company's finances wisely and responsibly.

# Penilaian Kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Performance Assessment of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi setiap tahuna seksukan penilaian kinerja. Penilaian ini dilakukan untuk mengetahui menjadi baik Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya.

Penilaian kinerja dilakukan dengan transparan dan akuntabel. Artinya, proses penilaianya terbuka dan dapat dipertanggungjawabkan. Semua informasi yang relevant dengan penilaian kinerja harus diungkapkan secara transparan, termasuk kriteria penilaian, proses penilaian, dan telah penilaian. Penilaian kinerja juga harus dapat memberikan umpan balik yang konstruktif kepada Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi untuk menc Gatkan kinerjanya diASA mendatang.

Proses penilaian kinerja dilakukan oleh pihak internal melalui metode penilaian secara individual (self-assessment), penilaian oleh rekan-Sejawat (peers assessment), dan penilaian pihak ketiga yang dilakukan Direktur Utama dan Dewan Komisaris.

The Board of Commissioners and Directors annually conducts performance assessments. This assessment is carried out to determine how well the Board of Commissioners and Directors carry out their duties and responsibilities.

Performance assessments are conducted transparently and accountable. This indicates that the evaluation procedure is transparent and responsible. Transparency must be maintained regarding all pertinent information regarding performance assessments, including the criteria, methods, and outcomes. The Board of Commissioners and Directors must be able to improve their performance in the future by receiving helpful feedback from performance assessments.

The performance assessment process is conducted by internal parties through the method of individual assessment (self-assessment), assessment by peers (peer assessment), and third-party assessment conducted by the President Director, and the Board of Commissioners.

# PROSEDUR PELAKSANAAN PENILAIAN KINERJA

Prosedur pelaksanaan penilaian kinerja untuk Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dilaksanan secara internal melalui mekanisme RUPS oleh para pemegang saham.

Dewan Komisaris bertugas.birthai kinerja Direktur Utama dan anggota Direksi lainnya. Dewan Komisaris menentukan kriteria penilaian kinerja terlebih dahulu dan mengkomunikasikannya kepada Direktur Utama. Kriteria penilaian kinerja harus mendorong Direktur Utama untuk mencapai tujuan perusahaan dan menciptakan nilai berkelanjutan.

Penilaian kinerja dimulai dengan evaluasi kompetensi dan keahlian Direktur Utama. Penilaian juga mempertimbangkan kinerja komite di bawah Dewan Komisaris dan penilaian mandiri maupun rekan terkait pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi. Setelah semua penilaian dikumpulkan, Dewan Komisaris akan mempertimbangkan telah penilaian tersebut but untuk mengambil keputusan final.

# KRITERIA PENILAIAN

Penilaian kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dilakukan berdasarkan kriteria yang spesifik, terukur, dapat dicapai, dan relevant. kriteria ini ditetapkan oleh Dewan Komisaris dan digunakan untuk menilai akuntabilitas Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dalam mencapai target kinerja perusahaan.

Kriteria penilaian kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris telah disetuji oleh Dewan Komisaris. Dewan Komisaris juga memastikan bahwa Direktur Utama mencevaluasi kinerja anggota Direksi lainnya secara objektif dan akurat berdasarkan kriteria tersebut.

Kriteria penilaian kinerja untuk Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan terdiri dari hal-hal sebagai berikut:

1. Evaluasi pribadi.  
2. Evaluasi kompetensi.  
3. Kinerja Komite-komite Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, serta rekomendasi perbaikan yang diperlukan (bila ada).  
4. Efektivitas Pelaksanaan Tanggung Jawab dan Proses Kerja Dewan Komisaris.  
5. Efektivitas Rapat Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.  
6. Evaluasi diri dan rekanunjawat.

# PROCEDURE FOR PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT IMPLEMENTATION

The performance assessment procedure for the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is conducted internally through the GMS mechanism by the shareholders.

The Board of Commissioners is responsible for evaluating the performance of the President Directors and other Board of Directors members. The President Director receives the performance assessment criteria after the Board of Commissioners decides them. Performance assessment criteria must encourage the President Director to achieve company goals and create sustainable value.

Performance assessment begins with evaluating the competence and expertise of the President Director. The assessment also considers the performance of committees under the Board of Commissioners and independent and peer assessments regarding the implementation of the duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners and Directors. After all assessments have been collected, the Board of Commissioners will consider the results of the assessments to make a final decision.

# ASSESSMENT CRITERIA

The performance assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners is based on specific, measurable, achievable, and relevant criteria. These criteria are determined by the Board of Commissioners and are used to assess the accountability of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners in achieving company performance targets.

The performance assessment criteria for the Boards of Directors and Commissioners have been approved by the Board of Commissioners. The Board of Commissioners also makes sure that the President Director uses these standards to fairly and accurately assess the performance of other Board of Directors members.

The following are the performance assessment criteria for the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners of the Company:

1. Personal Evaluation.  
2. Competency Evaluation.  
3. The performance of the Committees of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, as well as recommendations for necessary improvements (if any).  
4. Effective Implementation of Responsibilities and Work Processes of the Board of Commissioners and Directors.  
5. Effectiveness of Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors Meetings.  
6. Colleague evaluation.

# Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi

# Nomination and Remuneration Function

Hingga akhir tahun 2023, Perseroan belum membrutuk Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, namun demikian seluruh kegiatan yang Berkaitan dengan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi difjalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

Tugas dan tanggung jawab yang dilakukan Dewan Komisaris perihal fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi adalah:

1. Menyusun kriteria dan prosedur penyeleksian nominasi.  
2. Menyleksi calon anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.  
3. Menentukan remunerasi untuk anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.  
4. Menentukan dan melaksananakan pengawasan atas kebjikan nominasi dan remunerasi bagi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.

Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan tugasnya terkait fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi, mencikuti Pedoman Kerja (Board Charter) yang menjadi acuan dalam menentukan kebujakan terkait penominasian dan pemberian remunerasi kepada anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi. Dengan mencikuti pedoman ini, Dewan Komisaris berupaya memastikan transparansi, keadilan, dan keberlanjutan dalam proses nomasi dan remunerasi. Informasimendetail mengenai Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris dapat dibaca di halaman 121.

Dewan Komisaris membrahas hal-hal terkait nominasi dan remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi minimal 1 kali setup 4 bulan. Pada tahun 2023, Dewan Komisaris menjadikan rapat sebanyak 7 (tujuh) kali.

Selama tahun buku 2023, Dewan Komisaris melaksanan kegiatan yang Berkaitan dengan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi sebagai berikut:

1. Mengidentifikasi dan mengevaluasi kandidat Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris seksuai dengan kompetensi dan integritas yang dibutuhkan.  
2. Memimpin dan bertanggung jawab atas pengembangan, implementasi, dan peninjauan berkelanjutan atas perencanaan suksesi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.  
3. Memantau dan mangevaluasi kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris seda memberikan saran dan rekomendasi untuk pengGTKan dan pengembangan.  
4. Menyusun dan menetapkan remunerasi yang adil dan dan proporsional bagi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.  
5. Mempertimbangkan konsekuensi kewajiban pensiun dan manfaat jangka panjang lainnya bagi Direktur dan Komisaris bagi Perseroan.

Until the end of 2023, the Company has not formed a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. However, all nomination and remuneration functions activities are carried out by the Board of Commissioners.

The Board of Commissioners' duties and responsibilities regarding the nomination and remuneration function are:

1. To develop criteria and procedures for selecting nominees.  
2. To select candidates for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.  
3. To determine the remuneration for members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.  
4. Determining and supervising the nomination and remuneration policies for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.

In carrying out its nomination and remuneration functions, the Board of Commissioners adheres to the Board Charter, which serves as a reference in determining nomination policies and providing remuneration to members of the Board of Commissioners and Directors. The Board of Commissioners works to maintain sustainability, equity, and openness in the nomination and compensation process by adhering to these guidelines. The Board of Commissioners' Charter is available for reading on page 121.

The Board of Commissioners discusses matters related to the nomination and remuneration of the Board of Commissioners and Directors at least once every 4 months. In 2023, the Board of Commissioners held 7 (seven) meetings.

Throughout the 2023 financial year, the Board of Commissioners conducted activities related to the nomination and remuneration function as follows:

1. To identify and evaluate candidates for the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners based on their required competence and integrity.  
2. To lead and be responsible for the development, implementation, and ongoing review of succession planning for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.  
3. To monitor and evaluate the performance of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners and provide advice and recommendations for improvement and development.  
4. To prepare and determine fair and proportional remuneration for the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners.  
5. To consider the consequences of pension obligations and other long-term benefits for Directors and Commissioners for the Company.

# Nominasi dan Remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Nomination and Remuneration of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

# PROSEDUR NOMINASI DIREKSI DAN DEWAN KOMISARIS

Dewan Komisaris menususun prosedur nominasi untuk anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris. Prosedur ini berlandaskan pada pilar-pilar governansi korporat, yaitu perilaku beretika, transparansi, akuntabilitas, dan keberlanjutan. Prosedur nominasi ini bertujuan untuk mewujudkan komposisi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris yang beragam dengan anggota yang memiliki komitmen, pengetahuan, kemampuan, dan keahlian yang dibutuhkan untuk menjalankan tugasnya dengan baik.

Perseroanteringapkan prosedur nominasi dengamengikuti Pedoman Kerja dan peraturan perundangundangan yangmenjabarkankriteria yangharus dipenuhioleh anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.Selainkriteria,Dewan Komisaris juga dapat mengandalkanrekomendasi manajemen atau pemegang saham mayoritas.Dewan Komisaris memastikan Bahwa kriteria mencakuppengetahunan, Kemampuan, dan keahlian yang sesuai dengan peran Direksi,serta memperhatikan keberagamandalamkeanggotaanDireksi.

Proses nominasi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi yang dilakukan selanjutnya adalah memberikan rekomendasi atas masing-masing calon anggota yang memenuhi kriteria untuk disetujui di dalam RUPS. Setelah terpilih, Perseroan memastikan informasi mengenai susunan Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris terbaru telah diungkapkan dan tersedia di situs resmi Perseroan.

# PROSEDUR REMUNERASI DIREKSI DAN DEWAN KOMISARIS

Dewan Komisaris 若要usun struktur, kebikan, dan besaran remunerasi secara efektif dengan tujuan menyelaraskan kepentingan anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan kepentingan jangka panjang Perseroan dan penciptaan nilai yang berkelanjutan. Besaran remunerasi ditetapkan oleh RUPS dengan memempertimbangkan peran, situasi ekonomi, dan kinerja Perseroan.

Hasil RUPST pada 27 Juni 2023 menetapkan kenaikan gaji dan tunjangan Dewan Komisaris sebesar  $6 \%$  dibandingkantenahun 2022. Selain itu, peserta rapat memberikan kuasa penuh kepada Dewan Komisaris untuk menetapkan gaji, honorarium, tunjangan, dan fasilitas lainnya bagi anggota Direksi Perseroan pada tahun 2023.

# NOMINATION PROCEDURES FOR THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS

The Board of Commissioners prepares nomination procedures for members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners. This procedure is based on the pillars of corporate governance, namely ethical behavior, transparency, accountability, and sustainability. This nomination procedure aims to create a diverse composition of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners with members with the commitment, knowledge, abilities, and expertise needed to carry out their duties well.

The Company implements nomination procedures by following the Board Charter and statutory regulations, which outline the criteria that members of the Board of Commissioners and Directors must meet. Apart from criteria, the Board of Commissioners can also rely on recommendations from management or majority shareholders. The Board of Commissioners ensures that the requirements include knowledge, abilities, and expertise appropriate to the role of the Board of Directors, as well as paying attention to diversity in the Board of Directors membership.

The next nomination process for members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is to provide recommendations for each candidate who meets the criteria to be approved at the GMS. After being elected, the Company ensures that information regarding the latest composition of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners has been disclosed and is available on the Company's official website.

# REMUNERATION PROCEDURES FOR THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS

The Board of Commissioners effectively develops the structure, policies, and amount of remuneration to align the interests of members of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners with the Company's long-term interests and sustainable value creation. The GMS decides how much compensation to give based on the role, company performance, and financial status.

The AGMS results on June 27, 2023, indicated a  $6 \%$ increase in salaries and allowances for the Board of Commissioners compared to 2022. Furthermore, attendees granted the Board of Commissioners complete authority to decide on the Company’s directors’ salaries, an honorarium, benefits, and other benefits in 2023.

Prosedur penetapan remunerasi dilaksanan berdasarkan kinerja dari masing-masing anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris,{serta mempertimbangkan kemampuan financial Perseroan speerti diatur dalam UU PT Pasal 11 ayat 13 Akta No.28 Tahun 2015.

# Struktur Remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Total bescharan remunerasi untuk Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris yang terdiri dari gaji ata honorarium, tunjangan, serta fasilitas lainnya selama tahun buku 2023 telah sebesar Rp150,5 miliar.

The remuneration determination procedure is based on the performance of each member of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners, as well as considering the Company's financial capability as stipulated in Company Law Article 11 Paragraph 13 of Deed No. 28 of 2015.

# BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS MEETING

# Policy

Based on the Board of Commissioners Charter, policies related to Board of Commissioners meetings are described as follows:

1. The Board of Commissioners is required to hold meetings at least 1 (one) time in 2 (two) months.  
2. Board of Commissioners meetings can be held if attended by most of the Board of Commissioners.  
3. The Board of Commissioners is obliged to hold regular meetings with the Board of Directors at least 1 (once) every 4 (four) months.  
4. The presence of members of the Board of Commissioners at meetings of the Board of Commissioners and meetings of the Board of Commissioners with the Board of Directors must be disclosed in the Company's annual report.

The Board of Commissioners chairs meetings and has the right to make deliberate decisions to reach consensus. If there is no agreement, the decision is made by a majority vote. The results of meetings with the Board of Directors must be recorded in the minutes of the meeting, signed by members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners present, and submitted to all members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.

# BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEETING

# Policy

Based on the Board Directors Charter, policies related to Directors' meetings are described as follows:

1. The Board of Directors is obliged to hold regular Board of Directors meetings at least 1 (one) time every month.  
2. A Board of Directors meeting can be held if attended by a majority of the Board of Directors members.  
3. The Board of Directors is obliged to hold regular meetings of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners at least once every 4 (four) months.  
4. The presence of members of the Board of Directors at Board of Directors meetings and meetings between the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners must be disclosed in the Company's annual report.

The Board of Directors decides by majority vote if a consensus cannot be reached after much discussion and deliberation. To guarantee the meeting runs smoothly, information about the agenda and discussion topics is made public beforehand. Board of Directors meetings are used to decide on policies and strategies.
